trans-unit.source: Your Health Activity is a record of the health and related information you enter into and share with HealthTap. It is completely secure and private. Your Health Activity is used to provide you with better information on HealthTap. Your Health Activity is never visible to other members on HealthTap, but if you choose to start a private health conversation with a doctor on HealthTap using our new House Call feature, your real name and your Health Activity will be visible to that doctor. You can edit your Health Profile and add to your Health Activity at any time.
trans-unit.target: 您的健康活动是您在HealthTap上输入并分享的您的健康及相关信息的记录。它完全是安全的和私密的。您的健康活动用于为您提供有关HealthTap的更好信息。 HealthTap上的其他会员永远不会显示您的健康活动，但如果您选择使用我们的新的出诊功能与HealthTap上的医生开始私人健康咨询，您的真实姓名和您的健康活动将向该医生显示。 您可以随时编辑您的健康档案并添加到您的健康活动。

trans-unit.source: No. Prescriptions, diagnosis and medical treatment are not available on HealthTap. Please see your doctor or medical care provider for these as you normally would. Even if your real-life doctor is on HealthTap, prescriptions, diagnosis and treatment should not take place on or over the HealthTap service. HealthTap is not intended or designed to replace your doctor's independent judgment about the appropriateness or risks of symptoms, conditions or treatments (including procedures) for any given person, including you.
trans-unit.target: 不可以。在HealthTap上不可获得处方、医疗诊断或医学治疗。请照常去见您的医生或医学医护服务提供者来获取这些。即使您真实世界的医生也在HealthTap上，处方、医疗诊断或医学治疗也不应该被包含在HealthTap的服务内。HealthTap并不旨在代替您的医生为任何人根据症状、病症或治疗（包括临床操作）等独立做出的合理判断，包括您。

trans-unit.source: Who are the doctors on HealthTap? Are they all U.S.-licensed doctors in good standing? How are they selected?
trans-unit.target: HealthTap上的医生是谁？他们都是信誉良好的美国拥有执业执照的医生吗？他们是如何被挑选的？

trans-unit.source: All doctors on HealthTap are licensed to practice medicine in the U.S. and are in good standing. They include doctors from leading U.S. medical institutions (like Stanford and Harvard), as well as private practices from across the country. HealthTap Medical Experts are independent third parties, and are not employed by or affiliated with HealthTap. Admission to the HealthTap network is by application and invitation only.
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap上所有的医生都持有用药证书并且有良好的信誉。他们包括美国顶级医学院（比如斯坦福和哈佛）的医生，也包括美国的私人医生。HealthTap的医学专家独立于第三方，他们并不受雇或附属于HealthTap。只有申请或受邀才能进入HealthTap网站。

trans-unit.source: Can I get a prescription, a medical diagnosis or medical treatment on HealthTap?
trans-unit.target: 我能在HealthTap获得处方、医疗诊断或医学治疗吗？

trans-unit.source: Can I really submit a question to thousands of doctors for a free answer?
trans-unit.target: 我能向很多医生免费提交一个问题来获得回答吗？

trans-unit.source: Yes - it’s true!  Health questions submitted to HealthTap are submitted to our network of thousands of doctor across the U.S.  These doctors try to answer every question that’s submitted.  Questions are most likely to be answered when they have not already been asked and answered, and they are good health questions (easy to understand and useful to the entire HealthTap community). Learn more »
trans-unit.target: 是的 - 当然可以！HealthTap的问题将会上传到我们数以千计的医生网络中。这些医生会尝试回答每个被提交的问题。HealthTap的问题将会上传到我们数以千计的医生网络中。这些医生试着回答每个被提出的问题。了解更多 »

trans-unit.source: Why is question length limited? Can I ask a longer question?
trans-unit.target: 为什么问题的长度受限制？我能询问更长的问题吗？

trans-unit.source: Questions on HealthTap are limited to 150 characters to make them easy to view on mobile devices, and so that they can quickly be read and answered. Try re-phrasing or leaving out personal details to shorten questions. If you have a longer question to ask, you can make a 99 cent charitable donation and submit your question with 50 more characters, or you can ask a private question to a specific doctor on HealthTap (for a small fee).
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap上的问题被限制在150个字符内以便它们可以在移动设备上被浏览，这样它们可以得到快速回答。试着重新组织语言或剔除个人信息来缩短问题。如果您有更长的问题需要询问，您可以付出99美分的价格来提交一个可拥有50个额外字符的问题，或者您也可以向HealthTap上的一名特定医生询问一个私人问题（需要很少的费用）

trans-unit.source: How fast will I get a response to my question?
trans-unit.target: 我多快才能获得我的问题的回答？

trans-unit.source: Almost every question submitted to HealthTap receives an answer – especially those that are well-written. Most questions are answered promptly, often within 24 hours (some questions are answered within a few hours, or even a few minutes). Well written questions useful to the HealthTap community have the best chance of being quickly answered. The response time for questions asked for free depends on the number of other unanswered questions. If you’d like your question to receive priority (and to increase the likelihood of a fast response), you can make a charitable donation at the time you ask it.
trans-unit.target: 几乎所有的HealthTap的问题都会获得回答——尤其是那些精心提出的。大多数问题都会快速地被回答，一般是24小时之内（一些问题只需要几个小时甚至几分钟）。对HealthTap社区有益的精心提出的问题最有可能被快速回答。免费提出的问题的回答时间基于其他未回答的问题的数目。如果您希望您的问题被优先回答（或者添加快速回答的概率），您可以在询问时进行慈善捐赠。

trans-unit.source: Where does my money go when I pay to send my question to doctors?
trans-unit.target: 当我就我的问题向医生付款时，我的钱去了哪里？

trans-unit.source: All profits from payments to improve question response time and increase question length are donated to one of the many medical charities supported by HealthTap, including: Operation Smile, Doctors without Borders, American Red Cross, Susan G. Komen for the Cure, Direct Relief International, African Medical & Research Foundation (AMREF), Against Malaria Foundation, Nurse Family Partnership, Naya Health, Schistosomiasis Control Initiative (SCI), MAP International, Global Partners for Development, and others.
trans-unit.target: 所有加快问题回答速度和添加问题长度的费用都捐给了HealthTap支持的众多医疗慈善会中的一个，包括：微笑行动，无国界医生，美国红十字会，苏珊•科门乳腺癌防治基金会，国际直接救济组织，非洲医学&研究基金会，疾基金会，护士家庭合作计划，纳亚健康，血吸虫病控制计划，MAP国际，全球发展伙伴和其他

trans-unit.source: How much do Private Conversations cost? How long will it take to get an answer to a private question, and what if it’s is not answered?
trans-unit.target: 私人咨询的价格是多少？私人咨询多久才能收到回答，如果没有被回答呢？

trans-unit.source: There is a small fee (less than the cost of a typical co-pay for someone with comprehensive health insurance) to ask a private question directly to the doctor of your choice on HealthTap. When you submit a private question to a doctor on HealthTap, that doctor has up to 72 hours to answer the question. You will receive a full refund if the question is not answered within that time. Learn more »
trans-unit.target: 在HealthTap上您可以通过付出一笔很小的费用（低于有全面健康保险人的典型共同支付的费用）来直接向医生询问一个私人问题。当您在HealthTap上向医生提交一个私人问题的时，医生最多有72个小时来回答这个问题。如果在规定期限内您没有收到回答，您将会收到全额退款。了解更多 »

trans-unit.source: Is it possible to ask a question privately to a specific doctor of my choice using HealthTap and how are private questions different from public ones?
trans-unit.target: 我能在HealthTap上根据我个人的选择向特定的医生询问问题吗？私人问题和公共问题的区别是什么？

trans-unit.source: To ask your question to a specific doctor on HealthTap, send a doctor a direct message and start a Private Conversation. These messages are private and HIPAA-secure, and let you upload files (like scans or reports). Public questions submitted on HealthTap are distributed to multiple doctors and are public – both the question and the answer are visible to anyone who becomes a member on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 为了在HealthTap向一个特定医生询问您的问题，向他发送直接消息并开始私人咨询。这些消息是私人并是HIPAA安全的，您可以自己下载资料（如扫描或报告）。在HealthTap上提交的公共问题是分发给众多医生并公开可见的——问题和回答都对所有HealthTap的会员可见。

trans-unit.source: How long will it take to get an answer to this private question? What if it’s not answered?
trans-unit.target: 私人问题多久才能获得回答？如果它没有被回答怎么办？

trans-unit.source: When you submit a private question to a doctor on HealthTap, that doctor has up to 72 hours to answer the question. You will receive a full refund if the question is not answered within that time.
trans-unit.target: 当您在HealthTap上向医生提交一个私人问题的时，医生最多有72个小时来回答这个问题。如果在规定期限内您没有收到回答，您将会收到全额退款。

trans-unit.source: Can I make appointment requests using HealthTap?
trans-unit.target: 我能使用HealthTap进行预约请求吗？

trans-unit.source: Yes! HealthTap lets you request appointments with doctors on their Virtual Practice pages. Just hit the “Request Appointment” button and send the doctor your details. The doctor or his or her office should then contact you to schedule the appointment.
trans-unit.target: 可以！HealthTap使您可以在医生的在线诊疗网页上预约。点击“预约诊疗”按键并向医生发送您的详细信息。医生或他/她的办公室随后会联系您来确定预约时间。

trans-unit.source: What’s a DocScore and what does it mean?
trans-unit.target: 医者评分是什么，它意味着什么？

trans-unit.source: A DocScore is a number that reflects both publicly available information as well as a doctor’s reputation, experience, and engagement on HealthTap. The higher the number, the better. A high DocScore shows you (among other things) that the doctor is both active on HealthTap and that other doctors frequently agree with the answers that he or she provides on HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 医者评分是反应医生公开可获取的信息以及在HealthTap上的声誉、经验以及参与度的综合数字。数字越高越好。较高的医者评分告诉您医生不仅在HealthTap上保持活跃，而且经常获得其他医生对他在HealthTap上发表的回答的认同。

trans-unit.source: What is my Health Activity, what it is used for, and how do I edit it?
trans-unit.target: 我的健康活动是什么，它被用来做什么，我怎么编辑它？

trans-unit.source: To log in to HealthTap you must first register and create an account. When you do this, you’ll pick an email address and password to use. You can change your log in information in your settings at any time. If you’ve already registered and are having trouble logging in, please contact us.
trans-unit.target: 要登录HealthTap您必须先注册并创建一个账户。当您在做这些的时候，您需要选择一个邮箱地址和密码。您可以随时在设置中修改您的登录信息。如果您已经注册，但是无法登录，请联系我们。

trans-unit.source: How can I follow up with a doctor, or ask for a second opinion?
trans-unit.target: 我如何跟进一名医生并询问第二意见？

trans-unit.source: If you’ve asked a public question and want to follow up with the doctor who answered it, you can start a private conversation with that doctor. Similarly, if you’ve received a doctor’s opinion, you can start a private conversation on HealthTap to receive a second opinion. Private conversations allow you to upload and share documents and your health activity with the doctor.
trans-unit.target: 如果您提出了一个公开问题并想跟进那位回答了您问题的医生，您可以和那个医生开始私人咨询。同样的，如果您获得了一名医生的建议，您可以和他进行私人咨询来获得第二意见。私人咨询允许您与那位医生上传并分享您的档案和健康活动。

trans-unit.source: Would you like to video or text chat with me?
trans-unit.target: 您要与我进行视频或文本聊天吗？

trans-unit.source: Share a detailed description of your symptoms, concerns, and how you'd like the doctor to help you. Attach images and files as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 分享您的症状，担心以及您希望医生如何帮助您的详细说明。必须附加照片或文件

trans-unit.target: 注册HealthTap Prime——可24/7全天候向医生咨询！使用此链接即可获得$30优惠。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap gives you immediate, 24/7 access to doctors using your smartphone, or computer; get advice & prescriptions. Get your consult now and select a charity to receive a virtual consult for FREE.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap可让您使用智能手机或计算机立即，24/7全天候访问医生; 获得建议和处方。立刻获得您的咨询和选择一个慈善机构免费接受在线咨询。

trans-unit.resname: EDIT YOUR QUESTION <span class="sub_title">Want to change your question? You can do that here. Remember, proper grammar and correct spelling increase your chances of getting a great answer!
trans-unit.source: EDIT YOUR QUESTION <span class="sub_title">Want to change your question? You can do that here. Remember, proper grammar and correct spelling increase your chances of getting a great answer!
trans-unit.target: 编辑您的问题 <span class=”sub_title”>想要更改您的问题吗？您可以在这里做。记住，正确的语法和正确的拼写可以增加获得一个优秀的回答的机会！

trans-unit.resname: GUIDELINES To ask a great HealthTap question, use these helpful guidelines
trans-unit.source: GUIDELINES To ask a great HealthTap question, use these helpful guidelines
trans-unit.target: 指南 要提出一个优秀的HealthTap问题，请使用这些有帮助的指南

trans-unit.resname:
Sweat the details... at least a little. Hide examples
Good: I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks. What could be the causes?
Not so good: Why do I have a rash?
trans-unit.source:
Sweat the details... at least a little. Hide examples
Good: I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks. What could be the causes?
Not so good: Why do I have a rash?
trans-unit.target:
更多的细节...至少有一点。隐藏范例
好：在过去3个星期里，为什么我的手肘内部一直瘙痒，从而导致干性皮疹？这可能由什么导致？
不太好： 为什么我有一个皮疹？

trans-unit.resname:
Make it long enough to be helpful to others. Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers. Show examples
Good: What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
Not so good: Why back pain?
trans-unit.source:
Make it long enough to be helpful to others. Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers. Show examples
Good: What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
Not so good: Why back pain?
trans-unit.target:
使（您的问题描述）尽可能长这样可以帮助到其他人。因为世界各地有成千上万的人可能会读您的问题和其相应的答案。显示范例
好： 是什么导致在家里做家务后会后背疼 - 我的背部从来没有受过伤？
不太好： 什么背疼？

trans-unit.resname:
Include sex/gender, when relevant. Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful: What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast.
Sex/Gender not necessary: What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?
trans-unit.source:
Include sex/gender, when relevant. Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful: What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast.
Sex/Gender not necessary: What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?
trans-unit.target:
当相关时，包括性别。显示范例
性别有帮助:什么可能导致男人胸部下面一个四分之一大小的肿块？
不需要性别：在我的手背皮肤上。这个类似橡胶凸起，果冻豆的大小的东西是什么？

trans-unit.resname:
Include an approximate age. Show examples
Different ages will lead to different answers: For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts. What are some things that could cause this?
Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?
trans-unit.source:
Include an approximate age. Show examples
Different ages will lead to different answers: For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts. What are some things that could cause this?
Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?
trans-unit.target:
包括一个适当的年龄。显示范例
不同的年龄段有不同的解答： 前两天，我15岁的儿子发烧了，而且走路一瘸一拐的，好像腿受了伤一样。哪些东西可能导致这种情况？
为什么前两天我3岁的孩子发着烧，走路还一瘸一拐，好像腿受了一样呢？使问题尽可能的对其他人是有帮助的。

trans-unit.resname:
Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant. Show examples
Good: My son is 3 years old, weights 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall. Is his size OK for his age?
Not so good: My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34. Is he OK for his age?
trans-unit.source:
Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant. Show examples
Good: My son is 3 years old, weights 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall. Is his size OK for his age?
Not so good: My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34. Is he OK for his age?
trans-unit.target:
只要是相关的，包括体重、身高以及计量单位。显示范例
好：我3岁大的儿子，重27磅，高34英尺。在他这个年龄这个身高体重正常吗？
不太好：我3岁大的儿子，重27磅，高34英尺。在他这个年龄正常吗？

trans-unit.resname:
Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication. Show examples
Good: My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
Not so good: My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever. Tried Tylenol but fever persists. Take more Tylenol?
trans-unit.source:
Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication. Show examples
Good: My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
Not so good: My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever. Tried Tylenol but fever persists. Take more Tylenol?
trans-unit.target:
请同时使用药物的商标名和通用名称，尤其当您不在美国或问及不常见的药物时。显示范例
好：我5岁大的儿子，55磅，正在发烧。他服用5ml的泰诺（对乙酰氨基酚120mg / 5ml），但还在发烧。体重和年龄这么大的孩子可以服用更大剂量的泰诺吗？
不太好:我的儿子5岁，体重55，有一点发烧。已服用过泰诺但还在发烧。服用更多泰诺吗？

trans-unit.resname:
Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for a YES or NO answer. Show examples
Good: How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
Not so good: Do antibiotics work in children?
trans-unit.source:
Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for a YES or NO answer. Show examples
Good: How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
Not so good: Do antibiotics work in children?
trans-unit.target:
尽量避免提问一些医生回答“是”或者“不是”的问题。显示范例
好：抗生素如何在年轻的学龄儿童中起作用？
不太好：抗生素对儿童起作用吗？

trans-unit.resname:
Try to leave opinions out. Show examples
Good: Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
Not so good: Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?
trans-unit.source:
Try to leave opinions out. Show examples
Good: Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
Not so good: Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?
trans-unit.target:
尝试留下意见显示范例
好： 为什么有些人会抵抗疫苗，明明疫苗可以用来预防疾病？
不太好：那些反疫苗的人是彻底地不懂还是只是拒绝接受？

trans-unit.resname:
The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang. Show examples
Good: I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?
Not so good: Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?
trans-unit.source:
The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang. Show examples
Good: I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?
Not so good: Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?
trans-unit.target:
越清楚越好。运用好语法，不要说脏话和俚语。显示范例
好：我当时正在锻炼手臂，然后感到二头肌处有火烧一样的疼痛。我是肌肉撕裂了吗？
不太好：做弯举，感觉不对和胳膊受伤？

trans-unit.resname:
Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions. Show examples
Good: My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear. Is this common?
Not so good: And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?
trans-unit.source:
Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions. Show examples
Good: My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear. Is this common?
Not so good: And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?
trans-unit.target:
不要假设个人的历史知识。HealthTap的医生经常不会看到您以前的问题。显示范例
好： 我两岁的儿子两个月前得了耳管炎，现在还发烧了，右耳会流脓。这正常吗？
不太好： 这种症状已经持续两天，也一直有浓流出来吗？

trans-unit.resname:
To maintain privacy, leave your name and the names of others out (unless that “other” is a celebrity who has publicly talked about an issue). Show examples
Good: I just heard the actor Michael J. Fox talk about his Parkinson’s disease. Are there any new, good treatments that have come out in the last 3 years?
Not so good: Hello doctor. My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.
trans-unit.source:
To maintain privacy, leave your name and the names of others out (unless that “other” is a celebrity who has publicly talked about an issue). Show examples
Good: I just heard the actor Michael J. Fox talk about his Parkinson’s disease. Are there any new, good treatments that have come out in the last 3 years?
Not so good: Hello doctor. My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.
trans-unit.target:
为了保护隐私，请不要留下您的姓名和他人的姓名（“其他”除已公开谈论某个问题的名人的名字）。显示范例
好：我叫John Doe，我比较好奇是否有针对帕金森综合征的有效治疗方法。在过去三年里有新的，好的治疗方法面世吗？
不太好： 您好，医生。我叫John Doe，我比较好奇是否有针对帕金森综合征的有效治疗方法。

trans-unit.resname:
Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing. Show examples
Good: How do you know if you are pregnant, if you never have regular periods?
Not so good: How do u no ur prego if u never have reg periods?
trans-unit.source:
Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing. Show examples
Good: How do you know if you are pregnant, if you never have regular periods?
Not so good: How do u no ur prego if u never have reg periods?
trans-unit.target:
避免使用太多的缩写，因为可能导致混淆显示范例
好：如果您没有来生理周期，您是如何知道您怀孕了？
不太好：如果您没有正常的生理周期，您是如何知道您怀孕了？

trans-unit.resname:
Ask in English. This is the language commonly used by doctors on HealthTap. Show examples
Good: I pruned some trees last weekend and my arm has been hurting for 2 days. Could this be the cause?
Not so good: Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?
trans-unit.source:
Ask in English. This is the language commonly used by doctors on HealthTap. Show examples
Good: I pruned some trees last weekend and my arm has been hurting for 2 days. Could this be the cause?
Not so good: Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?
trans-unit.target:
用英语询问。这是HealthTap医生的常用语言。显示范例
好：我上周末修剪了一些树木，我的手臂已经疼了2天。这可能由什么引起？
不太好：因为我的胳膊很疼吗？

trans-unit.target: 我们真诚地向您道歉，但是似乎您离线可能是导致未接来电。如需进一步帮助，请联系我们的质量保证团队expertsupport@healthtap.com。（错误代码：%{error})

trans-unit.source: Please enter a valid device ID and passcode combination (Error code: %{error})
trans-unit.target: 请输入有效的设备ID和密码组合（错误代码：%{error})

trans-unit.target: 很抱歉，分配此设备时发生错误。（错误代码：%{error})

trans-unit.target: 您已经超过了允许的咨询数量

您的邮箱（可选，保持私密）

trans-unit.source: A New Grassroots Movement By Doctors
trans-unit.target: 医生的一次新的基层运动

trans-unit.source: There’s a new movement in healthcare – and it’s growing from a surprising place. Instead of emerging from government or industry, it’s budding from the grassroots –from everyday physicians. The movement is democratizing health information and giving birth to a new landscape: Interactive HealthInteractive Health is supported by three pillars: quality, access, and care.
trans-unit.target: 在健康医护领域有一个新的运动 - 它的成长从一个惊人的地方开始。并不是从政府或行业涌现而出，它是从基层阶层开始 - 来自每一天里的医师。该运动正在使健康信息民主化，并诞生出一个新的景观：互动式健康的三大支柱：质量，获取方式和医护。

trans-unit.source: NBC Bay Area takes a tour of the HealthTap office and learns about the exciting new features of HealthTap from Ron.
trans-unit.target: NBC湾区参观了HealthTap办公室，并从Ron了解了HealthTap令人兴奋的新功能。
以患者为中心的医师在线参与

trans-unit.source: Ron presents at ePatient Connections, the industry’s leading patient-centric communication conference. Ron shares how interactive health promotes transparency, quality, and better doctor relationships for patients.
trans-unit.target: Ron展示了ePatient连接，业界领先的以患者为中心的通信会议。Ron分享了促进互动健康中如何为患者促进透明度，质量和更好的医生关系。

trans-unit.source: Welcome to the New Era of Interactive Health
trans-unit.target: 欢迎来到互动健康的新时代

trans-unit.source: Interactive Health is not about "fixing" the broken healthcare system; it,s about engaging each of us in our health, empowering physicians to actively participate, and making health knowledge, supportive care, and motivation available to us, anytime and anywhere, so that we can live longer, healthier, happier lives.
trans-unit.target: 互动健康不是关于“修复”破坏的健康医护系统; 它是关于让我们每个人参与我们的健康，使医生积极参与，以及为我们随时随地提供健康知识，支持性医护和积极性，使我们能够活得更长，更健康，更幸福的生活。
微笑未开发的力量（视频）

trans-unit.source: A written transcript of my TED talk on the social, emotional and personal benefits of smiling, with references to some of the amazing studies that provided inspiration for the talk.
trans-unit.target: 关于微笑在社会，情感和个人利益中，我的TED演讲的书面记录，参考了一些为这次演讲提供灵感的令人惊叹的研究。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap: Personalized online health information - Robert Scoble (Video)
trans-unit.target: HealthTap:个性化的在线健康信息 - Robert Scoble（视频）

trans-unit.source: Leading American blogger and technology evangelist Robert Scoble sits down with Ron Gutman, Founder & CEO of HealthTap to talk about what HealthTap has created and the power of personalized health information from thousands of doctors, for free.
trans-unit.target: 免费提供，领先的美国博主和技术传播者Robert Scoble与HealthTap创始人兼首席执行官Ron Gutman坐下来关于HealthTap创造的内容，以及来自数千名医生的个性化健康信息的力量的交谈。

trans-unit.source: The New Health: Transforming Information into Action
trans-unit.target: 新健康：将信息转换为行动

trans-unit.source: A presentation on a new framework for personal health that helps engage people in their health using information, transforming into knowledge, and then into action.
trans-unit.target: 关于个人健康新框架的演讲，帮助通过使用信息，转化为知识，然后采取行动使人们参与到他们的健康中。

trans-unit.source: TEDx Silicon Valley — Insights into Organizing Leading Speakers (Video)
trans-unit.target: TEDx硅谷 — 组织领导演讲者的洞察力（视频）

trans-unit.source: A talk with insights and tips on how to get some amazing thought-leading speakers for your events.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何为您的活动获得一些惊人的领先思维的见解和小贴士的演讲。

trans-unit.source: The time has arrived to bring together what we,ve learned and build the foundation for true personalization in health that will help people live in an individualized way and help you lead a healthier, happier life.
trans-unit.target: 汇集我们所学到的，并为健康的真正个性化建立基础的时代已经到来，这将帮助人们以个性化的方式生活，并帮助您的生活更健康，更幸福。

trans-unit.source: A look into the "Substitutable Medical Apps, reusable technologies" program at Harvard, that is working to develop a flexible Health IT environment that will be the foundation for an iPhone like app-store for medical apps, based on shared basic components. Apple like these will help consumers to understand their healthcare data, save time, achieve better outcomes, and reduce costs.
trans-unit.target: 了解哈佛大学胰腺癌的“可替代医疗应用程序，可重复使用技术”计划，它正在努力开发一个灵活的健康T环境，这将是基于iPhone像医疗应用程序的应用商店的基础的分享基本组件。像这样的Apple将帮助消费者了解他们的健康医护数据，节省时间，实现更好的结果，并降低成本。

trans-unit.source: The story of how TEDx Silicon Valley was born, and an insightful review of it,s first annual event. TEDx Silicon Valley was one of the first licenses given to local communities to enable TEDsters around the world to create local independent TED events and help bring to life "ideas worth spreading."
trans-unit.target: 关于TEDx硅谷诞生的故事，以及对它的深刻见解，是第一次年度盛事。TEDx硅谷是最先授予当地社区来使世界各地的TED能够创建本地独立的TED活动，并第一个授权帮助实现“值得传播的想法”。

trans-unit.source: Jun. 22, 2012 - Ron Gutman is the CEO and founder of HealthTap, which creates mobile and Web applications with the goal of connecting individuals with medical professionals. Gutman spoke with the Washington Post’s Emi Kolawole about the power of turning doctors into health care information curators for the Web and on mobile. (Emi Kolawole/The Washington Post)"
trans-unit.target: 2012年6月22日－Ron Gutman是HealthTap的CEO和创始人，创建移动和网络应用程序，目的是将个人与医疗专业人士联系起来。Gutman与华盛顿邮报的Emi Kolawole谈到了将医生变成医疗信息管理者的网络和移动的力量。(Emi Kolawole/华盛顿邮报)"

trans-unit.source: TEDx Silicon Valley is an independently organized TED event, that gathers some of the world\s leading thinkers, makers, and doers to discuss social innovation. It is a day of stimulating presentations, discussions, entertainment, and art that sparks new ideas and opportunities for all involved.
trans-unit.target: Gutman与华盛顿邮报的Emi Kolawole谈到了将医生变成医疗信息管理者的网络和移动的力量。这是刺激演讲、讨论、娱乐和为所有参与者带来新的想法的和机会的艺术的一天。

trans-unit.source: The HealthTap Hacking 4 Health Hackathon brings together the best and most talented engineers and developers in the Bay Area, in conjunction with the HealthTap Developers Network, who are passionate about healthcare and the new Department of Health and Human Services Open Data Initiative. The first Hacking 4 Health event was hosted in 2010 and brought together over 200 developers, engineers and talented designers.
trans-unit.target: The HealthTap Hacking 4 Health Hackathon将旧金山湾区最优秀、最有才华的工程师和开发人员联合在一起，他们热衷于健康医护和新的卫生和人力服务部开放数据计划。第一次Hacking 4 Health活动于2010年举办，汇集了200多名开发人员、工程师和才华横溢的设计师。

trans-unit.source: The "Thanks Doc!" exhibit has been created around the care given by doctors and the appreciation shown by patients. Its multimedia format includes art panels, digital "Thanks", and hand-written notes
trans-unit.target: 显示的“谢谢医生”是基于医生提供的照顾以及患者表达的谢意创造的其多媒体格式包括艺术面板、数字“谢谢”和手写笔记。

trans-unit.source: [HealthTap] gives users a window into the apps that physicians actually find valuable.
trans-unit.target: [HealthTap]给用户一个医师实际上发现有价值的窗口来进入应用程序。

trans-unit.source: ... bring a new level of personalization in health care to the web.
trans-unit.target: ...给网络带来一个新的个性化的健康医护水平。

trans-unit.source: Mobile health startup HealthTap has acquired the health business of Avvo to build out its network of doctors and patients.
trans-unit.target: 移动健康启动HealthTap已经获得Avvo的健康业务，以建立其医生和患者网络。

trans-unit.source: [HealthTap is an app that helps you] keep your New Year's resolutions
trans-unit.target: [HealthTap是一个可以帮助您的应用程序]保持您的新年的决心

trans-unit.source: Increasingly, you may be able to access your own medical data—right from your smartphone.
trans-unit.target: 越来越多地，您可以从智能手机访问自己的医疗数据。

trans-unit.source: ...the quickest results, was the simplest to use. Helpful advice.
trans-unit.target: ...最快的结果，是最简单的使用。有帮助的建议。

trans-unit.source: A company that is defying the odds
HealthTap is one of the 'absolute best health apps' available today.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是目前可用的“绝对最好的健康应用程序”之一。

trans-unit.source: Have a pressing medical question? There's an app for that.
trans-unit.target: 有迫切的医学问题？这里有一个应用程序

trans-unit.source: [With HealthTap] everyone gets smarter about health care, and how to navigate the medical industry...
trans-unit.target: [有了HealthTap]每个人都对医疗保健，以及如何在医疗行业中的前进变的更聪明...

trans-unit.source: Healthcare Startups Can Save Lives — And Rake in Big Money
trans-unit.target: 医疗保健启动可以拯救生命 — 并聚集大量财富

trans-unit.source: HealthTap will metamorphose from a Q&A site into a service that doctors, hospitals, or provider organizations will buy to manage their larger patient pools more efficiently.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap将从Q＆A网站转变为医生，医院或提供商组织将更有效地管理其更大的患者库的服务。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap helps you 'prepare...to ask smarter questions when [you] get to the doctor's office'
trans-unit.target: HealthTap帮助您'准备...当您到医生的办公室时问一些更聪明的问题'

trans-unit.source: within a few hours you'll have a well-informed answer--no circuitous internet search required
trans-unit.target: 在几个小时内，您会有一个见多识广的回答 - 不需要迂回的互联网搜索

trans-unit.source: The web’s go-to repository for health info that’s actually reliable. ... over the past five months, 2,963 people have sent HealthTap thank-you notes saying that these doctor answers had saved their lives ... if someone were to ask you why healthtech is important, this is it.
trans-unit.target: 网络的go-to存储库的健康信息实际上是可靠的。…在过去五个月，2963人给HealthTap发送了感谢信，讲述这些医生的回答挽救了他们的生命…如果有人问您为什么健康技术是重要的，这就是原因。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s Q&A Service Sees 7.5M Uniques Per Month, With MDs Spending An Hour Per Session Providing 581M Answers
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的问答服务每月获得7.5M独一无二的问答，医学医生每次花费一小时时间提供581M回答。

trans-unit.source: With New Mobile Apps, Eric Schmidt-Backed HealthTap Brings The House Call Back to HealthCare
trans-unit.target: 有了新的移动应用程序，Eric Schmidt-Backed HealthTap使出诊进入健康医护

trans-unit.source: Both the personal characteristics for patient questions and the curbside consults for doctors leverage a network in ways that can bring faster relief to patients (and thereby, hopefully, reduce costs in the health care system) without risking the privacy of patients.
trans-unit.target: 利用网络的患者问题的个人特征和医生的咨询可以使患者更快地得到缓解（并且希望从而减少医疗保健系统中的成本）且不会危及患者隐私的方式。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap,s growth validates hypotheses about doctors and patients
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的成长验证了医生和患者的研究假设。

trans-unit.source: Its current network of more than 40,000 physicians vindicates CEO Ron Gutman.
trans-unit.target: 其目前超过4万医生的网络证明了首席执行官Ron Gutman的成功。

trans-unit.source: ...bring[ing] more transparency to the quality of care physicians provide.
trans-unit.target: ...使医护医师提供的质量更加透明。

trans-unit.source: A safe and secure way for consumers to get health advice from reliable sources
trans-unit.target: 消费者从可靠来源获得健康咨询的一个安全方式。

trans-unit.source: As easy as booking a flight online or comparison shopping for a new sofa.
trans-unit.target: 和在网上预定机票或购买一张新沙发一样容易。

trans-unit.source: A powerful marketing vehicle for doctors in addition to being a more complete information portal for patients.
trans-unit.target: 为医生提供强大的营销工具，同时为患者提供更完整的信息门户。

trans-unit.source: ...finding out...what doctors think of their peers has been...near impossible, for patients — up until now.
trans-unit.target: ...发现...医生认为他们的同行已经...几乎不可能，对于患者 - 直到现在。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is unique in its ability to connect patients with such a vast network of doctors in real-time.
trans-unit.target: 有着如此庞大的实时医师网络，HealthTap在连接患者的能力上是独特的。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap,s offer to patients: pay %{creditspriceplan} and text with a medical expert in real time
trans-unit.target: HealthTap提供给患者：与医学专家实时支付%{creditspriceplan}和文本。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap...appeal[s] to doctors who are wiling to define their roles and organize their time differently.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap ...吸引愿意定义他们的角色和不同地组织他们的时间的医生。

trans-unit.source: The platform highlights the inherent power of data divorced from identity
trans-unit.target: 该平台突出了从身份中分离的数据的固有能力。

trans-unit.source: Informative for users who need advice on health issues and, potentially, great public relations for doctors in search of new patients
trans-unit.target: 为需要关于健康问题的咨询的用户提供信息，并且潜在地为医生寻找新患者提供强大的公共关系。

trans-unit.source: The power of turning doctors into health care information curators for the Web and on mobile
trans-unit.target: 将医生变成医疗信息管理者的网络和移动的力量

trans-unit.source: It,s a big difference -- the difference between web 1.0 and the new mobile health revolution.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个很大的区别 - Web 1.0和新的移动健康革命的区别。

trans-unit.source: Goodbye doctor,s appointments and waiting rooms, hello HealthTap
trans-unit.target: 告别与医生预约、候诊室等待，加入HealthTap

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Adds Micro-Transactions For Remote Doctor Chat
trans-unit.target: HealthTap为远程医生聊天添加了微交易

trans-unit.source: Doctors can build up reputation..and ultimately drive patients to their offline real-world practices
trans-unit.target: 医生可以建立声誉..并最终驱使患者到他们的线下现实世界进行诊疗

trans-unit.source: HealthTap ,just might make you raise both eyebrows in surprise,.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap，只可能会让您惊讶到睁大双眼。

trans-unit.source: Advice for the ill, and points for the doctors.
trans-unit.target: 对生病的建议，以及对医生的见解。

trans-unit.source: This App Will Change Everything About Healthcare
trans-unit.target: 这款应用程序将改变医疗保健的方方面面

trans-unit.source: Startups Bring Capital, Innovation to Online Health Services
trans-unit.target: 创业为在线医疗服务带来资本、创新

trans-unit.source: It,s a health database and health-focused social network ... with the input of doctors
trans-unit.target: 它是一个健康数据库和以健康为重点的社交网络...随着医生的投入

trans-unit.source: The Ultra-Popular App That Has Convinced Doctors To Give Their Services For Free.
trans-unit.target: 已经说服医生免费提供服务的Ultra-Popular应用程序

trans-unit.source: Making health information accessible to everyone regardless of education or ability to pay.
trans-unit.target: 使所有人都能获得健康信息，无论教育程度或支付能力如何。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap may be on its (ambitious) way to being the default national rating and search destination.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap可能在其（雄心勃勃的）道路上去成为默认国家评级和搜索目的地。

trans-unit.source: What HealthTap is doing is revolutionary
The house call makes a comeback
HealthTap ,gives consumers more control over their health,
trans-unit.target: HealthTap，使消费者可以更多的控制他们的健康。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap was created ,to engage people in their health and to help them live healthier, happier lives,
trans-unit.target: HealthTap创建了使人们参与到他们的健康中并帮助他们生活得更健康更快乐。

trans-unit.source: [Increasing] its network of doctors available to answer patients, questions online, Palo Alto-based HealthTap is acquiring Q&A site Avvo Health.
trans-unit.target: [添加]其网络的医生可用于回答患者，在线问题，基于Palo Alto的HealthTap正在获取问答 问答 site Avvo Health。

trans-unit.source: The next time you have a medical question...try asking the doctors on HealthTap. It might save you 50 bucks in co-pays at the very least.
trans-unit.target: 您下次有医疗问题…尝试在HealthTap上询问医生。它可以至少在共同支付中为您节省50美元。

trans-unit.source: Could not have emerged at a better time.
trans-unit.target: 不可能出现在一个更好的时间。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap: Use Your Smartphone To Ask a Doctor How Bad That Rash Is
trans-unit.target: HealthTap:使用您的智能手机询问医生皮疹有多严重

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Brings Real Doctors Back Into Online Medical Advice
trans-unit.target: HealthTap使真实医生回到在线医疗建议

trans-unit.source: HealthTap isn,t the only service that puts real doctors on your computer screen or on your smartphone, but it,s the best we,ve seen
trans-unit.target: HealthTap不是唯一把真正的医生放在您的电脑屏幕或您的智能手机上的服务，但它是我们见到过的最好的。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Puts a Doctor On Your Smartphone, Helps You Find a Good One to See In Person
trans-unit.target: HealthTap在您的智能手机上放置一名医生，帮助您找到一个对您自己来说好的医生

trans-unit.source: Get medical information on the go
trans-unit.target: 随时随地获取医疗信息

trans-unit.source: a great social method to connect you with doctors who can offer real, sensible medical advice
trans-unit.target: 一个联系您和能提供真实、明智的医疗建议的医生的优秀的社会方法

trans-unit.source: It will likely continue to be a go-to source for people who need health advice or resources.
trans-unit.target: 它可能继续是需要健康咨询或资源的人的来源。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Debuts Paid Private Medical Consultations Via Mobile Device
trans-unit.target: HealthTap通过移动设备推出付费的私人医疗咨询

trans-unit.source: Its acquisition of Avvo Health will help it significantly expand its online medical community
trans-unit.target: 其收购Avvo Health将帮助其显著扩展其在线医疗社区

trans-unit.source: HealthTap unveils micropayment system and doctor chat
trans-unit.target: HealthTap推出微支付系统和医生聊天

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is ,reaching for the edge of what,s possible,
trans-unit.target: HealthTap正在靠近可能到达的边缘，

trans-unit.source: A powerful communication tool in the medical industry.
trans-unit.target: 在医疗行业的一个强大的通信工具。

trans-unit.source: Having legit doctors tell you which apps you should download and use makes a lot more sense.
trans-unit.target: 有合法的医生告诉您应该下载和使用哪些应用程序更有意义。

trans-unit.source: No other service has gotten doctors so engaged in answering questions and the reason is the "gamification of health."
trans-unit.target: 没有其他服务让医生如此回答问题，原因是“gamification of health”。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is...involving physicians in the conversations and by personalizing information to each person,s individual needs.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是…在谈话中涉及医生并通过个性化信息来满足每个人的个人需求。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap distinguishes itself from other health education websites by having practicing physicians answer the consumers, questions
trans-unit.target: HealthTap通过诊疗医师回答消费者的问题来与其它健康教育网站区分开来

trans-unit.source: Trust is the cornerstone of HealthTap
A sign that healthcare is moving to mobile
trans-unit.target: 健康医护正在转向移动的标志

trans-unit.source: HealthTap,s ,mission is to improve people,s health by helping them make better health decisions,
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的使命是通过帮助人们做出更好的健康决定来改善他们的健康，

trans-unit.source: A reliable resource when you,re looking for answers and helpful information.
trans-unit.target: 当您在寻找回答和有帮助信息时的一个可靠来源。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is a brilliant example of high-tech, high-touch medicine: social technology directly connecting practitioners and patients.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是高科技，高个性化医学的一个辉煌例子：社交技术直接与从业者和患者连接。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap aims to harness the mobile revolution to bring the house calls back into vogue - albeit virtually
trans-unit.target: HealthTap旨在利用移动革命将出诊变得流行－尽管是在线的

trans-unit.target: HealthTap添加了应用程序套件，医生通过文本咨询

trans-unit.target: Palo-Alto-based HealthTap，医生问答服务，医护提供者目录和转诊服务的分支。

trans-unit.source: Very little, if any, of the information consumers read online comes from their own personal physicians – HealthTap aims to change that.
trans-unit.target: 就算有，消费者在线阅读的信息很少来自他们自己的个人医生－HealthTap旨在改变这一点。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap takes Q&A with your physician mobile
trans-unit.target: HealthTap用您的医师手机进行问答

trans-unit.source: In a nutshell: Patients ask questions, Physicians answer questions
trans-unit.target: 简而言之：患者询问问题，医生回答问题

trans-unit.source: Get in direct contact with an expert physician for free via a smartphone
trans-unit.target: 通过一个智能手机和专家医生直接联系

trans-unit.source: Utilizes technology to better connect patients with their physicians
trans-unit.target: 利用技术使患者与他们的医师更好的连接

trans-unit.source: I am excited ... to provide my medical expertise for free to anyone in the world who needs my medical help or advice as long as they have access to the internet. How fascinating is that?
trans-unit.target: 我很兴奋...向世界上任何需要我的医疗帮助或建议的人免费提供我的医疗专业知识，只要他们能访问互联网。这是多么有趣？

trans-unit.source: All the convenience of symptom-Googling, but with the input and expertise of actual physicians.
trans-unit.target: 有着实际医师的输入和专业知识的所有symptom-Googling的便利。

trans-unit.source: When we first heard about HealthTap, we were intrigued but thought for sure there must be a catch. But after meeting Gutman, I’m sold.
trans-unit.target: 当我们第一次听说HealthTap的时候，我们很感兴趣，但认为肯定是一个圈套。但在会见Gutman后，我购买了。

trans-unit.source: Virtual health care is on its way to a multibillion dollar industry
trans-unit.target: 在线健康医护正在向数十亿美元的产业发展

trans-unit.target: HealthTap的多样化的患者工具使它与竞争的技术公司不同

trans-unit.target: 新SOS产品的发布是一个三年愿景的高潮，将极为普遍的使用与医学专家进行健康医护的方式与技术上最厉害的硅谷创业公司的数据收集和分析能力相结合

trans-unit.source: Navigating the current healthcare system can often be frustrating... one company trying to take the pain out of it is HealthTap
trans-unit.target: 浏览当前的健康医护系统常常是令人沮丧的……尝试从这种沮丧中走出来的公司是HealthTap

trans-unit.target: HOPES是使医院通过一个系统能完成所有的事情

trans-unit.target: HealthTap与合作伙伴FLEX使得健康福利更加容易操作

trans-unit.target: HealthTap揭开Compass的面纱，这是一个企业应用程序来帮助雇员管理他们的健康医护

trans-unit.source: HealthTap sets sights on employer customers
Don't like going to the doctor? The doctor can now come to patients, thanks to HealthTap.
trans-unit.target: 不喜欢看医生？有了HealthTap，现在医生能够走进患者。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap, a startup enabling patients and doctors to connect via the Internet for consultations and care, is adding a significant weapon to the arsenal it already provides its physicians: lab tests.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap, 一个使得患者和医生通过网络连接进行咨询和医护的启动菜单，添加了一个重要的武器到兵工厂，它已经提供给它的医师：实验室检验。

trans-unit.source: Starting today, doctors can prescribe lab tests, get your data back to the doctor rapidly, get it interpreted in no time.
trans-unit.target: 从今天开始，医生能够开实验室检查，快速收到数据，立刻解释化验单。

trans-unit.source: Thanks to progress in telemedicine, some patients no longer have to go to the doctor to see a doctor. It’s an approach that could mean that both health care providers and patients save money and time by cutting down on the number of visits to the doctor’s office.
trans-unit.target: 多亏远程医疗的进步，一些患者不再必须去看医生了。这是一种通过降低到医生办公室看病数量来使健康医护提供者和患者都能节约金钱和时间的方式。

trans-unit.source: Virtual care provider HealthTap marks milestone with Quest Diagnostics deal
trans-unit.target: 在线医护提供者HealthTap与Quest Diagnostics实验室的交易是一个里程碑

trans-unit.source: Benefitfocus Partners with HealthTap to Add End-to-End Virtual Care to Its New Voluntary Benefits Store
trans-unit.target: Benefitfocus和HealthTap的合作关系为其新志愿者福利商店加入端对端在线医护

trans-unit.source: DocNow connects users with physicians via HD video giving a new definition to the doctor house call.
trans-unit.target: DocNow连接用户与医生通过高清视频给予了医生出诊一个新的定义

trans-unit.source: Many experts say that if the Apple Watch is to succeed, it needs to offer killer apps with the kind of compelling functions that will make you want to buy one. What about HealthTap? Could that be the next big deal?
trans-unit.target: 许多专家说如果苹果智能手表能成功，它需要有吸引人注意的制胜法宝般的应用程序来使您想去购买。HealthTap怎么样？这是下一个大事吗？

trans-unit.source: You tap on the watch. You swipe the phone. And there's a doctor there. Nothing else
trans-unit.target: 您轻轻滑动手表您滑动手机并且这有一位医生在那里。没有其他的
公司在2015年打破了健康医护

trans-unit.source: ...by 2020 every physician around the world will have a virtual practice.
trans-unit.target: ...到2020年，世界上每一个医生都将有在线诊疗

trans-unit.target: 22款最好的苹果智能手表健康与健身应用程序

trans-unit.target: 在线门户网站提供有药物的记分卡——如果需要的话，与医生咨询

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is preparing to launch DocNow, an extension of its iOS app that will connect Watch owners to a doctor. Notably, users will be able transmit health data from a Watch to help with diagnosis.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap正准备开发DocNow,一个扩展的iOS应用软件连接手表主人和医生。尤其，用户将能够将传送智能手表的健康数据来帮助诊断。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's Watch apps let you tap into physician care
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的手表应用软件让您轻轻滑动进入医师医护

trans-unit.source: HealthTap‘s app presents a button to connect you to a primary care doctor for a $3 per minute video consult
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的应用软件上有一个按钮来连接您和一位普通门诊医生，这是一个每分钟3美元的视频咨询

trans-unit.source: I’m impressed at how HealthTap has taken up the unique Apple Watch strengths and exploited almost every aspect of its technology.
trans-unit.target: 我对于HealthTap如何发挥独特的苹果智能手表的优势和开发其技术的各个方面印象深刻

trans-unit.target: 用您的苹果智能手表和HealthTap来与您的医生对话

trans-unit.source: The revolutionary HealthTap DocNow App for Apple Watch connects you immediately to a primary care doctor for a video consult, all at the tap of a button.
trans-unit.target: 为苹果智能手机革命性的HealthTap DocNow应用软件立即连接您与普通门诊医生进行一个视频咨询，所有这些都在您点击按钮后即可开始。

trans-unit.source: With a tap, users can ask a question with their voice and then receive free text answers from doctors delivered to the watch.
trans-unit.target: 通过点击，用户可以通过语音问问题，然后通过智能手表收到医生发来的免费的文本回答。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is rolling out an app that provides consumers with high-definition video conferencing
trans-unit.target: HealthTap 正在推出一款应用程序为用户提供高清视频会议

trans-unit.target: HealthTap 开发苹果智能手表的应用软件，使其能快速连接Docs

trans-unit.target: 这里有如何避免去看医生

trans-unit.target: 医生在此网站Rate Drugs能给患者更多的力量

trans-unit.target: 现在您可以看到真正的医生对于您服用的药物是如何思考的

trans-unit.target: 这款应用软件通过真正的医生给出的建议来比较给您的处方

trans-unit.target: 美国的健康医护处于变革的中期阶段。

trans-unit.target: 在线患者使得医生去拓展他们的诊疗

trans-unit.target: 了解您的远程健康选项：与HealthTap的Ron Gutman的面谈

trans-unit.target: 这里最火的应用软件之一就是连接患者与医生的全天24小时连接，其全部是免费的。

trans-unit.target: 对于精选推荐：15款值得每个女孩在其手机上安装的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The 11 Best Sites to Get a Second Opinion, Online.
trans-unit.target: 11个最好的网站来在线获取第二意见。

trans-unit.source: Palo Alto-based HealthTap has released a ranking of health, wellness, and medical apps based on the public endorsements of thousands of doctors who use the HealthTap AppRx platform.
trans-unit.target: 位于帕罗的HealthTap发布健康，幸福，和医疗的应用程序的排名，根据数以千计的使用HealthTap APP医生测评平台的医生的支持进行的排名。
