什么可以使人们 FEEL GOOD?

trans-unit.source: When revolutionary startups need bold advice, active coaching, and honest feedback, they go to Keith Rabois. Keith began his career as a senior executive at PayPal, subsequently serving on the leadership teams at LinkedIn and at Square, as the company's Chief Operating Officer. As a Board member, he guided Yelp! and Xoom from their first year of inception through successful IPOs, while simultaneously investing in other like-minded entrepreneurs. Keith is an early investor in YouTube, Yammer, Palantir, AirBnB, Eventbrite, and other successful Silicon Valley startups.
trans-unit.target: 当革命性的初创公司需要大胆的建议、有效的训练和诚恳的反馈时，他们向Keith Rabois求助。Keith最初是贝宝的一名高级主管，接着在领英为领导团队供职，又在Square担任公司首席运营官。作为一名董事会会员，他从第一年开始带领Yelp!和Xoom通过成功的首次公开募股，同时也向其他志同道合的企业投资。Keith是YouTube, Yammer, Palantir, AirBnB, Eventbrite 和其他硅谷成功初创公司的早期投资人。

trans-unit.source: Sonja Perkins is the Managing Director of Menlo Ventures, where she focuses on Internet, communications, and software. Her investments and board seats include: Socialcast (VMware), Acme Packet (APKT), AssureNet Pathways (Symantic), Eloquent (ELO1), F5 Networks (FFIV), Solidcore (McAfee), and Vermeer Technologies (Microsoft). She serves as a director of the Western Association of Venture Capitalists (WAVC).
trans-unit.target: Sonja Perkins是门罗风投的总经理，她关注互联网、通讯和软件。她的投资和董事会席位包括：Socialcast (VMware), Acme Packet (APKT), AssureNet Pathways (赛门铁克), Eloquent (ELO1), F5 Networks (FFIV), Solidcore (迈克菲), 和Vermeer Technologies (微软)。她在西方风险资本家协会担任总监。

trans-unit.source: Emily Melton has served as a partner at Mayfield Fund and Draper Fisher Jurvetson, where she helped build each firm's consumer investment portfolio. She has served on the boards of NearbyNow, RedFin, and ShareThis, and was responsible for investments in Alphonso Labs, Meebo, Kudo (Google), RichRelevance, and Flux (MTVNetworks).
trans-unit.target: Emily Melton是梅菲尔德基金和德丰杰的合伙人，她帮助各个公司组建消费投资组合。她在NearbyNow, RedFin和ShareThis的董事会任职并负责Alphonso Labs, Meebo, Kudo (谷歌), RichRelevance 和Flux (MTVNetworks)的投资。

trans-unit.source: Skip is a Partner with Asset Management Company, where he invests in mobility, datacenter, and health science technology sectors. He has founded two startups, and has extensive experience in operational experience in software, visual systems, and government sales. He also serves on the board of the Johnson Foundation.
trans-unit.target: Skip是资产管理公司的合伙人，他向移动性，数据中心和健康科学科技部门投资。他创建了两个初创公司并在软件、视觉系统和政府销售中拥有广泛的运营经验。他也在约翰逊基金会的董事会任职。

trans-unit.source: Luc builds and grows teams, leads innovative Web products and optimizes SEO, SEM, and viral to scale online businesses to reach millions of customers. When he was 21, Luc founded www.travelpod.com, the world’s first travel blogging platform, which was later acquired by TripAdvisor/Expedia. As general manager at Expedia and then at TripAdvisor, Luc led the creation of two award-winning products: TripWow (“WebAward for Outstanding Achievement”—Web Marketing Association) and the Traveler IQ Challenge (Excellence in Social Media – CNMA). Today, he manages a top-notch team of analysts and engineers as VP of Search Engine Optimization (SEO) at TripAdvisor. He's the general manager for several TripAdvisor products like TripWow, the Traveler IQ Challenge, and TravelPod, which was named by PC Magazine as a “Top 100 site you can’t live without”. In addition to advising for HealthTap, Luc also acts as an advisor for several other incubators and high-growth startups, including FounderFuel and BusBud.
trans-unit.target: Luc构建和增强团队，领导创新的网络产品，并优化搜索引擎优化，标准电子组件和病毒来扩展在线业务，以覆盖数百万客户。当他21岁时，Luc创立了www.travelpod.com，这是世界上第一个旅行博客平台，后来被猫途鹰/智游天下收购。作为智游天下的总经理，后来在猫途鹰，Luc领导了两个获奖产品的创建：TripWow (“WebAward卓越成就&rdquo - 网络营销协会)和地理 IQ大挑战（社交媒体卓越—通信网络与制造应用标准）。今天，他作为猫途鹰的副总裁在搜索引擎优化（SEO）方面管理着一个顶级的分析师和工程师团队。他是几个猫途鹰产品的总经理，如TripWow，地理IQ大挑战和TravelPod，它被PC杂志命名为“100强您无法离开的网站”。除了担任 HealthTap的顾问，Luc还是其他几个孵化器和高增长初创公司的顾问，包括FounderFuel和BusBud。

trans-unit.source: Alex is the VP of Growth at Facebook and manages user acquisition and retention, helping drive mobile adoption, self-service advertiser/page admin acquisition, and helping drive other product adoption as required. The channels he uses tend to be: SEO/SEM, email/sms/push notification marketing and onsite merchandising. Alex also manages the internationalization team at Facebook. Prior to Facebook in 2007, Alex spent three years at eBay in email marketing. Alex holds an MSc degree in Physics from the University of Cambridge.
trans-unit.target: Alex是Growth at Facebook的副总裁，管理用户的获取和保留，帮助推动移动应用，自助服务广告客户/网页管理员获取，以及帮助推动其他产品的采用。他使用的渠道往往是：搜索引擎优化/ 标准电子组件，电子邮件/短信/推送通知营销和现场商品销售。Alex还在脸谱网管理国际化团队。在2007年的脸谱网之前，Alex花了三年时间在eBay在电子邮件营销方面。Alex拥有剑桥大学物理学硕士学位。

trans-unit.source: In its current state, our healthcare system is expensive, difficult to access, and error prone. On the brink of a massive reform in healthcare, dedicated, bright entrepreneurs and technologists can bring a great deal to the table by developing creative, forward thinking solutions that leverage health care professionals. HealthTap is at the forefront of this development, improving patient care by creating quick, easy, and affordable access to doctors everywhere. The future of healthcare is at the confluence of big data, smart algorithms, and simple-to-use interfaces that will provide amplification of our MD's resources: HealthTap is breaking ground in all three, and we're excited to help them make their compelling vision a transformative reality.
trans-unit.target: 在目前的状态下，我们的健康医护系统是昂贵的，难以访问，并且容易出错。在医疗保健大规模改革的边缘，专注，聪明的企业家和技术专家可以通过开发利用健康医护专业人士的创新，前瞻性的解决方案，带来很大的好处。HealthTap 处于这一发展的前沿，通过创建快速，轻松，价格实惠的医疗服务，改善患者医护。健康医护的未来是大数据，智能算法和简单易用的接口的融合，将提供我们MD的资源的放大：HealthTap 在所有三个方面都取得突破，我们很高兴能帮助他们使他们令人信服的愿景成为一个变革性的现实。

trans-unit.source: Everyone will soon become the CEO of their own health. HealthTap, with its phenomenal growth in combination with its unique technology, has the potential to become the triaging platform for everyone's health. I am excited to work with the HealthTap team as the company scales to provide people with unparalleled immediate access to the most trusted medical knowledge, doctors, and health services.
trans-unit.target: 每个人都很快就会成为自己健康的CEO。HealthTap, 凭借其独特的技术与其惊人的增长，有可能成为每个人的健康的分类就诊平台。我很高兴与HealthTap 团队一起工作，随着公司规模扩大，为人们提供无与伦比的即时可访问最可信的医学知识，医生和健康服务。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap has the opportunity to touch everyone on the planet and to become a great enterprise—maximizing both social and economic value. It delivers value for patients, who will gain unprecedented access to doctors; value for doctors, who can treat more people more easily and cost-effectively; and value for society, which has been searching for a long time for a way to solve the healthcare dilemma of rising costs and an aging population. And given its unique and imaginative business model HealthTap is poised to become one of the most profitable businesses in the world. It’s a real game changer.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap有机会接触地球上的每个人，并成为一个伟大的企业 - 最大限度地提高社会和经济价值。它为患者提供价值，他们将获得前所未有的医生访问; 医生的价值，可以更容易地和更具成本效益地治疗更多的人; 还有社会的价值，它一直在寻找一个方法来解决成本上升和人口老龄化的长期的健康医护困境。鉴于其独特的和富有想象力的商业模式HealthTap有望成为世界上最赚钱的企业之一。这是一个真正的改变游戏规则。
Mark Leslie的莱斯利风险投资

trans-unit.source: HealthTap embodies the powerful consumer Internet trend of moving high-value mainstream offline experiences, such as doctor-patient interactions, to the online world. The company leverages the three key innovation drivers that I'm most excited about: mobile apps that enable new kinds of rich, personalized interactions via smartphone and tablet; gamification that enhances user engagement and retention; and social mechanics, such as expert-based Q&A and reputation graphs, that facilitate deep interest and trust. It's this kind of fresh thinking that will accelerate the “consumerization” of healthcare, and re-invigorate an extremely important and valuable industry that has been behind the IT curve and mired in inefficiency for decades.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap体现了强大的消费者互联网趋势，将高价值的主流离线体验（如医生与患者之间的互动）转移到在线世界。公司利用我最激动的三个关键创新驱动因素：通过智能手机和平板电脑实现新型丰富的个性化互动的移动应用程序; 增强用户参与和保留的游戏化; 和如基于专家的问与答和声誉图的社会机制，促进深厚的兴趣和信任。这种新的思维将加速消费化” 的健康医护，并重新激励这个已经由于背后的IT曲线和陷入无效率几十年的一个极其重要和有价值的行业。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is helping define the new field of “Interactive Health”—the sector that is moving consumer health information to new platforms, like smartphones and tablets, to provide portability and immediate access to actionable information. Consumers and physicians are increasingly joining the online conversation, and interactive health deserves the close attention of the investment community. HealthTap demonstrates the potential of this emerging space.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap正在界定交“交互健康&rdquo的新领域——这个领域正在将消费者的健康信息移向新的平台，比如智能手机和平板电脑，来提供可携带性和即时的信息获取。消费者和医生越来越多地加入在线咨询，互动式健康值得投资界的密切关注。HealthTap展示了这一新兴空间的潜力。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's approach is brilliant. It delivers what people miss about medicine most: a highly engaging personalized experience, with trusted doctors sharing helpful information.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap的方法非常出色。它提供了人们最想知道的药物信息：高度个性化的体验，与值得信赖的医生分享有帮助的信息。

trans-unit.source: I tend to [invest in] things that are e-commerce, like healthcare. Things that are actually more complex to do and solving a real problem in a big market where there's nobody else doing what HealthTap is doing. What HealthTap is doing is revolutionary.
trans-unit.target: 我倾向于[投资于]电子商务的东西，如健康医护。事实上，在一个没有其他人做HealthTap正在做的事情的大市场上，做更复杂的事情并解决一个真正的问题。HealthTap正在做的是革命性的。

trans-unit.source: Mari Baker, Investor, Board of Trustees of Stanford University
trans-unit.target: 斯坦福大学董事会投资者Mari Baker

trans-unit.source: I love working at HealthTap! I’ve already worked on several exciting projects on the engineering team. This is the first internship I’ve had where I’m really making a difference. It’s been awesome to work in such a positive environment with other passionate people, while helping to save lives and make people feel good, not to mention the awesome perks like Isaac's/Gagan's chocolate shop. :)
trans-unit.target: 我喜欢在HealthTap工作！我已经在工程团队里从事几个令人兴奋的项目。这是我第一次实习，我真的有所作为。在与其他热情的人一起工作在这样一个积极的环境，同时帮助拯救生命，给人的感觉真的很好，更不用说津津乐道像Isaac’s/Gagan的巧克力店。:)

trans-unit.source: Speaking from past experience, a good internship is one where you're empowered to take initiative and be able to make a difference even as an intern in such a short time. In that sense, the internship experience at HealthTap delivered in spades. Very happy to be part of such a great team at such an important time for the company.
trans-unit.target: 从过去的经验来看，这是一个您有权利采取主动的好的实习，是一个能够在这么短的时间内作为实习生有所作为的实习。在这个意义上，坦率的交付HealthTap的实习经验很高兴在这样一个重要的时刻成为如此伟大的一个团队的一部分。
斯坦福商学院研究生院

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is great. The people are friendly and really dedicated to trying to help make the world a healthier place; the problems the team are working on are both technically interesting, and extremely important. I am honored to have had a chance to get to be a part of that environment.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是伟大的。人们是友好的，真正致力于帮助使世界成为一个更健康的地方; 团队正在开发的问题在技术上都很有趣，而且非常重要。我很荣幸能有机会成为这个环境的一部分。

trans-unit.source: B.A.S Classics and Mathematical & Computational Science
trans-unit.target: 经典和数学与计算科学

trans-unit.source: I have learned so much by interning at HealthTap, not only about engineering but also about having passion for a mission. I have gotten to work on projects that have a direct impact on the product while also being surrounded by people who are always looking towards the bigger picture. It’s been such an amazing experience and I would totally do it all over again.
trans-unit.target: 我通过在HealthTap实习不仅学习了很多，不仅是关于工程，还有对任务的热情。我已经开始工作，对产品有直接影响，同时被总是在寻找更大的前景的人们包围着。这是一个如此惊人的经验，我希望再完全的做一遍。
计算机科学学士候选人

trans-unit.source: HealthTap has been amazing so far. I took this internship looking for the "startup experience" and can honestly say I've got it plus much more. There is always something interesting to work on, which makes each day unique and exciting. It has truly been a pleasure working for HealthTap this summer.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap到目前为止是惊人的。我在这个实习期间寻找"初创公司体验" 并可以诚实地说，我学到了很多。总有一些有趣的工作，这使得每一天都不同和令人兴奋。在今年夏天，这真的是很高兴为HealthTap工作。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap has been an invaluable experience. The work that the interns are given has been technically challenging and extremely important for the product, for the mission. Everyone is friendly, smart, and extremely hard working.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是一个非常宝贵的经验。实习生的工作在技术上是具有挑战性的，对于产品，对于任务来说都非常重要。每个人都是友好的，聪明的，而且非常努力地工作。

trans-unit.source: There aren’t many places that you can get an experience like you would at HealthTap. From day one you are empowered to take on projects that make a significant difference and you are expected to achieve those goals but given the support to learn and hone new skills to get there. That would be a fulfilling internship in it of itself but what separates HealthTap is the opportunity to solve challenging and important problems with an incredibly talented and passionate group of people.
trans-unit.target: 没有很多地方，您可以得到一个像您在HealthTap的经验。从第一天起，您有权力承担起有重大意义的项目，并且希望实现这些目标，但是因为支持学习和磨练新的技能来实现这一目标。这将是一个充实的实习，HealthTap是一个机会，解决具有挑战性和重要的问题，成为一个拥有令人难以置信的才华和激情的人。

trans-unit.source: It's been a pretty amazing learning opportunity to spend a summer at a company filled with talented people, who are driven by a mission to change health care. The internship experience is exactly what I was hoping for - I've really valued the time people have been willing to give me, and the opportunity to have an impact from day one. I unreservedly recommend the internship program!
trans-unit.target: 这是一个非常惊人的学习机会，花一个夏天在一个充满了人才的公司，那些人都是把驱动健康医护的改变作为自己的使命。实习经验正是我所期望的 - 我真的非常珍惜人们愿意给我的时间，并从第一天起就有机会产生影响。我毫无保留地推荐实习计划！

trans-unit.source: Working at HealthTap this summer has been a great experience. I immediately jumped into a number of cool projects, which was a little overwhelming at first, but really rewarding and empowering as well. I am learning so much, and the best part has been that I've contributed to real products and projects that will help form the infrastructure of this growing company. The people here are so friendly! And, there's free chocolate.
trans-unit.target: 今年夏天在HealthTap工作是一个伟大的经验。我立即加入一些很酷的项目，虽然一开始有一些压力，但也有真正的奖励和授权。我学习了很多，最好的部分是，我已经贡献真正的产品和项目，这将有助于形成这个成长中的公司的基础设施。这里的人是如此友好！并且，还有免费的巧克力。

trans-unit.source: My time at HealthTap cannot be described as anything less than revolutionary. I have had the privilege of working with brilliant, passionate and innovative people from every field as we all strive to re-design the doctor-patient experience. From challenging projects and meaningful mentorships to balcony lunches and physics-defying chairs, HealthTap has it all. :)
trans-unit.target: 我在HealthTap的时间不能说是革命性的。我有幸与来自各个领域的杰出，热情和创新的人一起工作，我们都努力重新设计医生-患者体验。从挑战性的项目和有意义的导师，阳台午餐和物理辩论椅子，HealthTap有这一切。:)

trans-unit.source: My internship at HealthTap has not only exposed me to the fabled "startup experience", but also given me the opportunity to be part of a team that aims to change the world. The energy around the office is nothing short of infectious, and I've learned so much in the little time that I've spent here. I can honestly say that I love coming into work every single day.
trans-unit.target: 我在HealthTap的实习不仅让我看到了传说中的"初创公司体验"，而且给予我机会成为一个旨在改变世界的团队的一部分。办公室周围的能量没有传染性，我在这里度过的小时间里学到了很多。我可以诚实地说，我喜欢每天的工作。

trans-unit.source: There are so many reasons why I'm excited to walk into the HealthTap office every morning. In many internship programs, mentors play a supportive role and teach students a lot. What makes the HealthTap internship program unique, though, is that I have been given some real, important responsibilties and I am therefore able to play a role in the growth of a movement. The people here are energetic and inspiring. Every day, I'm challenged to take charge of a project and see it through to completion. It's so exciting to work at HealthTap!
trans-unit.target: 有很多的原因解释为什么我每天早上进入HealthTap办公室很兴奋。在许多实习计划中，导师扮演支持角色，并教会学生很多。但是，HealthTap实习计划的独特之处在于，我获得了一些真正重要的责任，因此我能够在运动的成长中发挥作用。这里的人是充满活力和受到激励的。每天，我都有责任承担一个项目，并完成任务。在HealthTap工作非常令人兴奋！

trans-unit.source: HealthTap has a supportive community, either your boss, colleagues, or people from other groups are happy to provide help at anytime. I've learned a lot every week during my work here, I'm appreciative for the opportunity.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap有一个支持社区，您的老板，同事或其他团体的人都乐意随时提供帮助。我在这里的工作的每一周都学到了很多，我很感激这个机会。

trans-unit.target: 请提供医生的手机号码

trans-unit.target: 询问问题，您将被连接到医生

trans-unit.target: 请告诉我们您的问题，我们会为您推荐最好的医生

trans-unit.source: Determine what virtual consults you’ll offer
trans-unit.target: 确定您会提供什么样的在线咨询

trans-unit.source: You can offer your patients different types of consults, such as asynchronous messaging during text chat consults or live high-definition video consults. For example, follow-up appointments and pre-op evaluations can be done virtually.
trans-unit.target: 您可以为您的患者提供不同类型的咨询，如通过文字聊天咨询的异步消息或实时高清视频咨询。例如，后续预约和预估计可以在线完成。

trans-unit.source: Set your prices for different virtual consult
trans-unit.target: 为不同的在线咨询设置您的价格

trans-unit.source: You can set the prices for each type of Virtual Consult. This includes Live Consults, which can occur anytime without scheduling during your Virtual Office Hours; Inbox Consults, which are asynchronous messages; and Virtual Appointments. During these virtual consults, you can provide medical advice, order and refill prescriptions, order and review lab tests, and more!
trans-unit.target: 您可以为每个类型的在线咨询设置价格。这包括实时咨询，它可以随时安排在在线办公时间内；收件箱咨询，这是异步消息；和在线预约。在这些在线咨询中，您可以提供医疗建议，订购和补充处方药，订购和审查实验室测试，以及更多！
选择您的在线办公时间

trans-unit.source: The ultimate scheduling flexibility: you can set your Virtual Office Hours anytime you like. This is when you’ll be online and available for virtual consults with your patients.
trans-unit.target: 最强的计划灵活性：您可以随时设置您的在线办公时间。这是当您在线并有时间与您的患者进行在线咨询。

trans-unit.source: Market to and contact your patients

Customized marketing materials and HealthTap’s proprietary email tool make it easier than ever to share and communicate about your Virtual Practice with your patients. You can also connect your social media accounts and add a HealthTap Medical Expert widget to your website.
trans-unit.target: 定制营销材料和HealthTap专有的邮箱工具，使它比以往任何时候都更容易与您和患者分享与交流您的在线诊疗。您也可以连接您的社交媒体账户并添加HealthTap医学专家小工具到您的网站。

trans-unit.source: We’ll handle patient billing and payments so you don’t have to worry about them.
trans-unit.target: 我们会处理患者的帐单和付款，所以您不必担心。
接收您的专属客户经理

trans-unit.source: Get one-on-one, enhanced practice implementation support to seamlessly integrate Virtual Care into your real-world practice. We'll strategize with you to address practice goals, train your staff, create customized materials for you, and work directly with your patients to ensure your goals are met.
trans-unit.target: 获得一对一，提高诊疗实施支持，将在线医护无缝集成到您的现实世界诊疗中。我们将与您一起制定策略，以实现诊疗目标，培训您的员工，为您创建定制材料，并与您的患者直接合作，以确保您的目标得到满足。

trans-unit.source: Increased visibility, reputation, and loyalty for your medical group
trans-unit.target: 提高您的医疗团队的可见度，声誉和忠诚度

trans-unit.source: Significant incremental revenue opportunity for your practice
trans-unit.target: 为您的诊疗大幅增加收入的机会

trans-unit.source: Reach your individual and practice goals with dedicated help
trans-unit.target: 通过专门的帮助来实现您的个人目标和诊疗目标

trans-unit.source: Guidance with short, one-on-one training sessions and support
trans-unit.target: 短期指导，一对一的培训课程和支持

trans-unit.source: Set up your Virtual Practice with help from our Chief Medical Officer
trans-unit.target: 在我们的首席医务官的帮助下设置您的在线诊疗

大幅减少
每笔交易费用

trans-unit.source: HealthTap holds the promise of flexible hours and a flexible lifestyle, so that the physicians of today and tomorrow are better able to lead by example, provide timely, informed care for anyone, anytime, anywhere.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap保证您拥有灵活的工作时间和灵活的生活方式，使医生在之后的工作中更能以身作则，为任何人在任何时候任何地方提供及时的、明智的医护。

trans-unit.source: To have someone tell you you saved his life is the best feeling in the world. Six people have told me I saved their life. I haven't experienced that level of professional satisfaction in a long time. Nothing in medicine is more satisfying for doctor and patient than to have one on one time to listen to each other in a relaxed environment without interruption
trans-unit.target: 有人告诉您您挽救了他的生命是世界上最好的感觉。六个人告诉我，我挽救了他们的生命。我在很长一段时间没有经历过这种水平的专业满意度。对于医生和患者来说，在医学中没有什么比在一个轻松的环境中一次又一次地相互倾听而不被中断更令人满意的了

trans-unit.source: Wonderful interface to speak directly face to face with patients, provide them a database of expert answers to health questions, and ongoing coaching for health and wellness through checklists.
trans-unit.target: 与患者直接面对面的精彩的界面，为他们提供一个专家回答健康问题的数据库，并通过清单不断进行健康与保健指导。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is the future of medicine, and I'm really excited to be part of the transformation. How could I not be excited to be part of the next big change in how health care is both delivered and perceived?
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是医学的未来，我真的很兴奋能够成为改革中的一部分。我怎么能不能兴奋成为下一次关于健康医护如何传递和感知的重大变化的一部分？

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is nothing short of amazing. I love it and I love working on it. I find myself to be amongst the luckiest people to have a job they love and get to help people at the same time.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap不缺乏惊艳。我喜欢它，我喜欢在上面工作。我发现自己是最幸运的人，有一份自己热爱的工作同时也能帮助别人。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap helps me feel like a virtuoso in medicine by reconnecting me to colleagues and patients
trans-unit.target: HealthTap通过重新联系我的同事和患者，帮助我感觉到自己是医学名家

trans-unit.source: I feel a renewed sense of humanitarianism. I am inspired and connected.
trans-unit.target: 我感到了新的人道主义感。我受到鼓舞并已连接。

trans-unit.source: I plan to invite my patients to join so that on my weekend they can ask for me if it is my shift.
trans-unit.target: 我计划邀请我的患者加入，这样在周末如果是我值班就可以询问我了。

trans-unit.source: What was impossible a year ago, is now POSSIBLE. I'd have to say that each consult has been impactful, because each case is so different. It is unbelievable, the camaraderie, support, and peer-led education that's available for free. The EMR is also fantastic and quick to browse through.
trans-unit.target: 可能一年前还是不可能的，现在已是可能的。我不得不说，每个咨询都是有影响力的，因为每个案例都是不同的。这是令人难以置信的，友谊，支持和同行主导的教育，都可以免费提供。电子病历也是太棒了，可以快速浏览。

trans-unit.source: I think HealthTap will revolutionize medical care. I'm so thrilled to be using HealthTap to connect with patients and physicians from around the world. I have over 8000 followers on HealthTap---that's incredible.
trans-unit.target: 我认为HealthTap将彻底改变医疗。我非常激动的使用HealthTap在世界各地连接患者和医生。我在HealthTap有超过8000名关注者 ---这是令人难以置信的。

trans-unit.source: ...this technology can and has been INVALUABLE
trans-unit.target: ...这项技术可以并且已经是无价的了

trans-unit.source: The consults I have had were fun to do, interesting too!
trans-unit.target: 我的咨询是有乐趣的，也是有趣的！

trans-unit.source: This is Dr. Geoff Rutledge, the Chief Medical Officer at HealthTap. I’d like to personally offer you a benefits solution that can significantly reduce healthcare costs for your clients, deliver peace of mind for their employees, and strengthen your customer relationships. Our award-winning approach is already delighting hundreds of millions of people across the world and rapidly displacing traditional telemedicine offerings within dozens of Fortune 500 companies. Today, we are offering this proven solution to you at an unprecedented value that will help you make more money and retain your book of business.
trans-unit.target: 这是HealthTap的首席医务官Geoff Rutledge医生。我想亲自为您提供一个福利解决方案可以显著降低您的客户的医疗成本，让他们的员工安心，并加强您的客户关系。我们的屡获殊荣的方法已经使全世界数亿人感到愉快，并迅速取代了数十家财富500强公司的传统远程医疗产品。今天，我们以一个前所未有的价值为您提供这个已经验证的解决方案，将帮助您赚更多的钱并且可以保留您的业务。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is a tremendous complement to traditional health insurance plans, particularly well suited for clients with high deductible plans. Our HealthTap Prime service is an affordable subscription to all of the virtual care needed by an individual (or even a family), offering unlimited access to doctor-created health information and answers to health questions, as well as immediate consultations with primary care doctors (via text, audio or video), 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, directly from any web connection, or mobile device.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap是对传统医疗保险方案的巨大弥补，特别适合具有高扣除额方案的客户。 我们的HealthTap Prime服务对所有需要在线医护的个人（或甚至一个家庭）来说是一个实惠的订购，提供无限访问医生创建的健康信息和健康问题的回答，以及立即咨询普通门诊医生的机会（通过文字，音频或视频），每天24小时，每周7天，直接从任何网络连接或移动设备。

trans-unit.source: This is Geoff, from HealthTap. I'd like to personally invite you to take advantage of a new state-of-the-art solution for your customers' travel-health needs that also provides you with a highly profitable addition to the services you already deliver. Our virtual healthcare solution will delight your customers with the best travel health information and 24/7 access to advice and consultation from our network of U.S.- licensed physicians, whenever your customers need help, anywhere in the world, on any mobile device.

trans-unit.source: Read the rest of this thank you note

The excitement about HealthTap Prime, our new special service that connects you and your loved ones with a top doctor via video or text chat anytime, anywhere, has been phenomenal. Real HealthTap users and doctors were so inspired by using HealthTap Prime, they couldn’t wait to share their experiences. “As parents, using HealthTap Prime has really given us peace of mind knowing that we can contact a doctor 24/7,” shared dad Tristen OBrien on %{open_link}Good Morning America%{close_link}.
trans-unit.target: 关于HealthTap Prime已经成为了一种现象的令人兴奋的我们新的特别服务，通过视频或文本聊天，随时随地通过顶级医生连接您和您的亲人。真正的HealthTap用户和医生通过使用HealthTap Prime受到激励，他们想要迫不及待地分享他们的体验。“作为父母，使用HealthTap Prime真的让我们放心，知道我们可以全天24小时与医生联系，”爸爸Tristen OBrien对%{open_link}早安美国%{close_link}的分享。

trans-unit.source: If you’d like more information on how you might participate in these media interviews to inspire more caring doctors and help more people like you, please %{open_link}share details of your story here%{close_link} or email us at stories@healthtap.com with the best way to reach you. There are no associated costs, and if there are any travel expenses, we’ll cover them for you.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想了解更多关于如何参与这些媒体采访以鼓励更多关心的医生，并帮助更多像您一样的人，请选择您最方便的方式，在这里%{close_link}分享您的故事%{open_link}或发送电子邮件到我们stories@healthtap.com没有相关的费用，如果有任何旅行费用，我们将为您解决。

trans-unit.source: I came across HealthTap when I was short of breath. I was suffering with lower back pain and HealthTap doctors said it could be a collapsed lung. Seeing this, naturally I was worried. I called 911 and was transported to the emergency room. I was released 2 days ago & I'm healing nicely..thanx 2 ur website...you saved my life! I thank you from the bottom of my heart :-)
trans-unit.target: 当我呼吸短促时，我碰到了HealthTap。我患有腰痛，HealthTap医生说可能是肺功能衰竭。看到这一点，我自然很担心我拨打了911，被送到急诊室。我被释放2天前和我正在愈合..thanx 2 ur网站...您挽救了我的生命！我从心底感谢您 :-)

trans-unit.source: We noticed that you included a question in your thank-you note to %{expert}. We’d be delighted to help you get an answer to your question. You can do so in two ways.

trans-unit.source: First, you can ask it using our free “Ask Doctors” service. Top doctors answer members’ questions—often within minutes—so you get a personalized response to your health concerns. Or you can schedule a real-time video or audio Virtual Consult with a doctor (a premium service). We’re sure you’ll be delighted with the results either way!

trans-unit.source: Be easy to understand: Questions must be in English, easy to understand, and about health or wellness topics.
trans-unit.target: 易于理解：问题必须用英语，易于理解，以及关于健康或健康话题。

trans-unit.source: Check spelling of words and medicines: Medications in different countries use different names, so be sure to include the generic name of the medication. Our experts are U.S.-licensed doctors and rarely answer questions about uniquely foreign medications they are not familiar with, or about hospitals or procedures in other countries that they have not visited.
trans-unit.target: 检查单词和药物的拼写：不同国家/地区的药物使用不同的名称，因此请务必包含药物的通用名称。我们的专家是拥有美国执业执照的医生，很少回答关于他们不熟悉的国外独特的药物，或他们没有访问的其他国家的医院或临床操作的问题。

trans-unit.source: Unlimited consults with doctors 24/7 using a PC or any mobile device!
trans-unit.target: 使用电脑或任何移动设备24/7全天候与医生无限咨询！

trans-unit.source: Total peace of mind with a doctor always "on call" for you and your loved ones
trans-unit.target: 完全放心的为您和您的亲人经常与“随传随到”的医生

trans-unit.source: Health checklists personalized by doctors just for you or your family
trans-unit.target: 医生只为您或您的家人提供的个性化的健康清单

trans-unit.source: Ask meaningful questions: Questions must include enough detail to be meaningful and answerable. Naming a topic (for example, “headache?”) without asking something specific, doesn,t give the doctor enough information to accurately answer. You can consider mentioning gender, duration, age range, or body area affected.
trans-unit.target: 询问有意义的问题：问题必须包含足够有意义的和有责任的详细信息。命名一个话题（例如，“头痛？”）而不询问具体的东西，不给医生准确地回答的足够信息。您可以考虑提到有影响的性别，持续时间，年龄范围或身体区域。

trans-unit.source: Stay private: Do not include your name, names of other people, or doctors, names.
trans-unit.target: 保持私密：不要包括您的姓名，其他人的姓名或医生，姓名。

trans-unit.target: 要联系此医生，请选择上面的链接之一。

trans-unit.source: Great news! %{expert}, a %{specialist}, just responded to your case:
trans-unit.target: 好消息！%{expert}, a %{specialist},只回复了您的案例：

trans-unit.source: We value you as a HealthTap member because you’re helping us add to our renowned database of doctor-provided health information!
trans-unit.target: 我们重视您成为HealthTap会员，因为您正在帮助我们添加我们著名的医生提供的健康信息数据库！

trans-unit.source: As a valued HealthTap member we would like to offer you 15 days FREE on HealthTap Prime; our premium service that gives you unlimited live Virtual Consults with doctors 24/7 on any device. Get advice, prescriptions, and personalized reminders from top doctors.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个重要的HealthTap会员，我们愿意为您提供15天免费的HealthTap Prime；我们的高级服务，将给您在任何设备上与医生全天24小时无限实时在线咨询的体验。您可以从顶级医生那里获得建议，处方和个性化的提醒。

trans-unit.source: We know you’ve been waiting a while for an answer to your question, and we’d like to thank you for your patience. We also want to let you know that not all questions on HealthTap receive answers. A question is likely to go unanswered if it lacks detail, if the question is unclear, or if it contains terms with which the doctors are not familiar. Your question is much more likely to receive a response if you improve it by editing and resubmitting it.
trans-unit.target: 我们知道，为了您问题的回答，您已经等待了一段时间，我们要感谢您的耐心等待。我们也想让您知道不是所有在HealthTap的问题都能得到回答。如果一个问题不详细，问题不清楚，或者如果包含了医生不熟悉的术语，那么这个问题可能不会得到答复。如果您通过编辑以及重新提交来改进问题，您的问题很可能会收到回复。

trans-unit.source: We encourage you to look around HealthTap+ at other questions, tips, checklists, and relevant information, and use it to improve your question. With our huge database of questions and health topics, chances are you’ll find similar questions that have the answer you’re looking for.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议您在HealthTap +查看其他问题，小贴士，清单和相关信息，并使用它来改进您的问题。有了我们庞大的问题和健康话题的数据库，您会发现您正在寻找的类似问题的回答。

trans-unit.source: After you review similar content, we suggest you
trans-unit.target: 在您查看类似的内容后，我们建议您

trans-unit.source: Ways to improve your question include:

trans-unit.source: Thanks for editing your question! We know it will help us find you the answer you’re seeking

trans-unit.source: If you’d like to get your question answered faster, you can also become a HealthTap Prime subscriber for priority status in receiving answers. trans-unit.source: See related doctor insights on related topics

trans-unit.source: We’re ready to help you live a happier, healthier life: just take a few minutes to tell us a little more about yourself. Please complete your profile to start benefiting from a more personalized experience.

trans-unit.source: You can now have a team of top doctors on-call for personalized advice and tips whenever you need it. But first, we need your help! In order for us to match you to the perfect doctors, we need you to %{open_link}complete your health profile%{close_link}.

trans-unit.source: Expert advice from top doctors on any device, 24/7
trans-unit.target: 随时随刻在任何设备上获取知名医生的专家建议
私人问题在24小时内回答

trans-unit.source: Welcome, we’re delighted you have joined HealthTap! To complete your signup, just download our app (for either iOS or Android). It’s absolutely free, and will take you just a few seconds. Then you’ll be on your way to enjoying all the privileges that membership offers:
trans-unit.target: 欢迎，我们很高兴您已加入HealthTap！只需下载我们的应用程序即可完成您的注册（适用于iOS或安卓）。它是绝对免费的，只需您几秒钟。然后，您将会享受提供给会员的所有特权：

trans-unit.source: Your message subscription to %{expert} has been canceled. If this is a mistake, simply click on the link below to re-subscribe.
trans-unit.target: 您对%{expert}的邮件订购已取消。如果这是一个错误，只需点击下面的链接重新订购。

trans-unit.source: If you would like to reconnect with %{expert} in the future for medical advice, prescriptions, lab tests, and more, you can re-subscribe by clicking the link below.
trans-unit.target: 如果您日后想要与%{expert}重新连接，以获得医疗建议，处方，实验室检验等，您可以点击以下链接重新订购。

trans-unit.source: %{expert} is also available by one-time message consults for advice, prescriptions, lab tests ordering and more %{open_link}here ›%{close_link}.

trans-unit.source: We’re happy to see that you’re taking control of your health with your message subscription to %{expert}. This message subscription means you can send %{expert} as many messages as you need—and %{expert} can respond with advice, write prescriptions, order lab tests, and more! We wanted to let you know that %{expert} changed the price for his message subscription service to %{price}.
trans-unit.target: 我们很高兴看到您通过订购%{expert}的消息来控制您的健康状况。此消息订阅允许您向%{expert}发送所需数量的信息并获取医生建议、处方、实验室检验及更多内容!我们想让您知道，%{expert}将他的邮件订购服务的价格更改为%{price}。

trans-unit.source: We’re happy to see that you’re taking control of your health with your message subscription to %{expert}. This message subscription means you can send %{expert} as many messages as you need—and %{expert} can respond with advice, write prescriptions, order lab tests, and more!
trans-unit.target: 我们很高兴看到您通过订购%{expert}的消息来控制您的健康状况。此消息订阅允许您向%{expert}发送所需数量的信息并获取%{expert}的建议、处方、实验室检验及更多内容!

trans-unit.target: 谨此提醒您，您将于%{date}收取%{price}的费用。您可以随时%{open_link}取消%{close_link}。

trans-unit.source: %{expert} has decided to discontinue the message subscription service. %{expert} will continue providing this service for you until the end of your current cycle after which this subscription will be canceled.
trans-unit.target: %{expert}已决定停止消息订购服务。%{expert}将继续为您提供此服务，直到当前周期结束，此后该订购将被取消。

trans-unit.source: %{expert}, %{specialty} offers message subscriptions for %{money}. At any point, if you would like you can message subscribe to %{expert} here ›.
trans-unit.target: %{expert}，%{specialty}提供%{money}的邮件订购。在任何时候，如果您希望您可以在这里消息订阅%{expert} ›。

trans-unit.source: Congratulations on getting a message subscription to %{expert}. With this message subscription, getting answers to your health concerns from %{expert} is now easier than ever. You can send as many messages as you need, and %{expert} can respond with advice, write prescriptions, order lab tests, and more!
trans-unit.target: 恭喜您收到%{expert}的邮件订购。使用此邮件订购，比以往更容易的从%{expert}获取对您的健康担忧的回答。此消息订阅允许您向%{expert}发送所需数量的信息并获取%{expert}的建议、处方、实验室检验及更多内容!

trans-unit.source: You have been charged %{number_to_currencymessage_subscription_price}. Your next charge will be on %{next_due_date}.
trans-unit.target: 您已收取的%{number_to_currencymessage_subscription_price}.您的下一次收费将在%{next_due_date}。

trans-unit.source: If you have any questions about this service, please let me know.
trans-unit.target: 如果您对这项服务有任何疑问，请告诉我们。

trans-unit.source: Virtual Consults are great for treating non-urgent symptoms, learning more about a condition or treatment, getting prescriptions — when your doctor is unavailable or when you want a second opinion. Virtual Consults are for primary care, and are not available for specialty care.
trans-unit.target: 在线咨询非常适合治疗非紧急症状，更多地了解病症或治疗，获得处方 — 当您的医生不可用或当您想要第二意见。为普通门诊的在线咨询，不适用于特殊医护。

trans-unit.source: You’ll receive a summary of your consult
trans-unit.target: 您将收到您的咨询总结

trans-unit.source: After the consult, you’ll be able to securely access the doctor’s summary on HealthTap, including any prescriptions, referrals, and checklists for you.
trans-unit.target: 咨询之后，您就可以安全地在HealthTap上访问医生的总结，包括为您的任何处方，转诊，和清单。

trans-unit.source: You’ll receive personal recommendations or a checklist
trans-unit.target: 您将收到私人推荐或清单

trans-unit.source: Doctors will also provide you with recommended actions or a checklist following you consult, reminding you what you can do.
trans-unit.target: 医生还会在您咨询后向您提供建议的行动或清单，提醒您可以做什么。

trans-unit.source: You’ll automatically receive personal reminders via email and mobile notification
trans-unit.target: 您将通过电子邮件和移动通知自动收到私人提醒

trans-unit.source: Reminders related to any recommended actions or any checklist provided to you by your doctor will automatically be sent to you by email and (if you have HealthTap on your mobile device) mobile notification.
trans-unit.target: 您的医生给您提供的任何建议或任何相关的清单会自动通过电子邮件（如果在您的移动设备中安装有HealthTap）和移动通知发送给您。

trans-unit.source: These reminders are personal and just for you
trans-unit.target: 这些提醒是私人的，只为您

trans-unit.source: These reminders are tailored to you and your consult. They may contain information related to treatments and medications (including prescriptions) and other personal health-related information specific to your virtual consult. You can opt out of receiving these notifications by email or your mobile device at any time
trans-unit.target: 这些提醒是专为您和您的咨询的定制的。它们可能包含与您在线咨询的相关治疗和药物（包括处方）和其他个人健康相关信息的信息。您可以在任何时候通过电子邮件或移动设备选择接收这些通知

trans-unit.source: Don’t Use Virtual Consults for Emergencies
trans-unit.target: 不要为紧急情况使用在线咨询

trans-unit.source: Never use HealthTap Prime in an emergency situation. Always call %{emergency_number} or your local emergency service immediately if you think you may have an emergency.
trans-unit.target: 切勿在紧急情况下使用HealthTap Prime。如果您认为有紧急情况，请随时拨打%{emergency_number}或呼叫当地紧急救援服务。

trans-unit.source: Don’t Use Virtual Consults for Serious Injuries, Severe Conditions, or for Mental Care
trans-unit.target: 不要对严重的伤害，严重的情况或精神医护使用在线咨询

trans-unit.source: Don’t use HealthTap Prime if you have a serious injury or condition (such as chest pain, seizures, difficulty breathing, burns, or any critical or life-threatening situation. Also, don’t use HealthTap prime for mental, behavioral, or addiction issues.
trans-unit.target: 如果您有严重的损伤或病症（如胸痛，癫痫，呼吸困难，烧伤），或任何严重或危及生命的情况请不要使用HealthTap Prime。此外，不要对心理，行为和成瘾问题使用HealthTap。

trans-unit.source: Any prescription for narcotics or DEA (Drug Enforcement Administration) controlled substances (Schedule I, II, III, IV)
trans-unit.target: 关于麻醉药品的处方或DEA（缉毒局）控制的物质（附表I，II，III，IV）

trans-unit.source: Any prescriptions for medications that are restricted by individual states
trans-unit.target: 个别国家限制的药物的任何处方

trans-unit.source: Any prescriptions for psychiatric or lifestyle medications (for example, diet or erectile dysfunction drugs)
trans-unit.target: 任何关于精神病或生活方式的药物的处方（例如饮食或勃起功能障碍的药物）

trans-unit.source: As many consults with doctors as needed, 24/7 on any PC or mobile device!
trans-unit.target: 在任何个人电脑或移动设备上24/7全天候，根据医生需要的许多咨询！

trans-unit.source: What to Expect with HealthTap Prime
trans-unit.target: 使用HealthTap Prime可以期待什么

trans-unit.source: Congratulations on subscribing to your first checklist! You'll feel good taking action to accomplish your health goal of “%{checklist}” And you'll have the convenience of getting a doctor's reminder just for you. Here’s what to expect from adding this checklist to your profile:
trans-unit.target: 恭喜您订购了您的第一份清单！您会feel good地采取行动，完成您的健康目标“%{checklist}”并且您会有只为您的方便的医生提醒。将此检查清单添加到您的个人资料的期望以下：

trans-unit.source: Stay engaged with your health by receiving checklists and reminders
trans-unit.target: 通过接收清单和提醒，使您保持健康

trans-unit.source: Checklists are a great way to stay engaged with your health. These checklists contain reminders about actions you can take to reach health goals, manage health conditions, and feel good.
trans-unit.target: 清单是一个优秀的方式，为您保持健康。这些清单包括您可以采取达到健康目标行动的提醒，管理健康的条件，并感觉良好。

trans-unit.source: Get better care from our doctors
trans-unit.target: 从我们的医生得到更好的医护

trans-unit.source: Marking actions as “complete” gives doctors important information for your next Virtual Consult. They'll know how to better tailor your treatments based on the actions you’ve taken in the past.
trans-unit.target: 标记行动为“完成”可以为您的下一次在线咨询向医生提供重要信息。他们知道如何根据您过去的行动来更好地调整您的治疗方法。

trans-unit.source: Get reminders by email and mobile device notification
trans-unit.target: 通过电子邮件和移动设备通知获得提醒

trans-unit.source: When you subscribe to a checklist, you’ll automatically receive reminders via email and push notification. Of course, you can always opt out of these reminders at any time.

trans-unit.source: My name is Kelly, from HealthTap, a Silicon Valley startup revolutionizing the healthcare industry by providing instant online and mobile access to our network of over 71,000 top physicians. By connecting people around the world to highly qualified doctors for virtual consults via any mobile device or computer, HealthTap bypasess the inefficiencies of traditional care to immediately give patients the medical attention they need.
trans-unit.target: 我是Kelly，来自HealthTap，一家硅谷初创公司，通过提供即时在线和移动访问我们网络上超过71,000名顶级医生而改变了医疗行业。通过任何移动设备或计算机将人们连接到高质量的医生进行在线咨询，HealthTap绕开了低效率的传统医护，可以立即给予患者他们需要的医疗关注。

trans-unit.source: As the underlying costs of healthcare drive up insurance premiums, more individuals are choosing to skip check-ups or pay out of pocket for smaller healthcare issues, rather than use their insurance. HealthTap is a tremendous complement to traditional health insurance, particularly for clients with high deductible plans seeking effective alternatives to expensive in person care. As a HealthTap Partner, you can connect your clients to personalized on-demand care while regaining some of the lost profit.
trans-unit.target: 由于健康医护的潜在成本提高了保险费，更多的个人选择跳过体检或支付更小的健康医护问题，而不是使用他们的保险。HealthTap是对传统医疗保险的巨大弥补，特别是对于那些有高扣除额计划寻求有效替代昂贵的个人医护的客户。作为HealthTap合作伙伴，您可以将您的客户连接到个性化的按需医护，同时恢复一些损失的利润。

trans-unit.source: Help us reinvent healthcare by providing medical care anytime, anywhere. To learn more about this unique opportunity, please simply click here or reply back to partner.benefits@healthtap.com with your name and number.

Send me your contact information via email to partner.benefits@healthtap.com, or take just a moment to fill out this interest form, and a partnership specialist will be delighted to show you how you can earn even more by partnering with us this month.

trans-unit.source: We have limited partnership opportunities available this month, so get started today.

Our award-winning approach is already delighting hundreds of millions of people across the world and rapidly displacing traditional telemedicine offerings within dozens of Fortune 500 companies. Today, we are offering this proven solution to you at an unprecedented value that will help you make more money and retain your book of business.

trans-unit.source: Learn more about this exclusive program.

I’d like to invite you to become a HealthTap Benefits Partner. Boost your income, delight your clients, and grow your business by leveraging our award-winning virtual healthcare service to enhance your health-insurance offerings.
trans-unit.target: 我希望邀请您成为HealthTap福利合作伙伴。通过利用我们屡获殊荣的在线医疗服务来提高您的健康保险产品，提高您的收入，使您的客户高兴，并发展您的业务。

trans-unit.source: Our innovative solution provides your clients with affordable access to immediate consults with top Board Certified U.S. doctors by HD video, voice, or text chat from anywhere, on any smartphone, tablet, or PC — 24/7! You can deliver meaningful ROI to your clients and peace of mind to their employees with trusted, immediate, and affordable access to doctor advice, prescriptions, diagnostics, and post-consult checklists and reminders. This service is a tremendous complement to traditional health insurance plans and particularly beneficial for clients who have high deductible plans and Health Savings Accounts.
trans-unit.target: 我们的创新解决方案为您的客户提供价格实惠的咨询，通过高清视频，语音或文字聊天从任何地方，任何智能手机，平板电脑或电脑 - 24/7全天候与顶级美国医学委员会认证的医生进行即时的咨询！您可以为客户提供有意义的投资回报率并且让他们的员工安心，通过可信，即时和实惠的方式获得医生建议，处方，诊断和咨询后的清单和提醒。这项服务是对传统医疗保险计划的巨大弥补，特别是有利于有高可扣除额计划和健康储蓄账户的客户。

Some of our partners are already earning more than $50,000 from just a single 100-member implementation.To find out more about partnering with us to offer this innovative and profitable program to your clients, simply tell us your phone number and a time to call:

trans-unit.target: 为新的医学专家帐户创建密码

trans-unit.source: Many heartfelt thanks for helping us spread health, happiness, and smiles to millions everywhere. We appreciate your friendship and are grateful for your support. May all the good things in life be yours in abundance :)
trans-unit.target: 非常感谢您帮助我们将健康，幸福和微笑传播给数百万人。我们感谢您的友谊并感谢您的支持。愿您的生命中充满美好的事物:)

trans-unit.source: I’m excited to share with you that 2014 has been our best year ever, and we’re looking forward to a fabulous 2015, in which we will bring even more health, good life, and smiles to you and many millions everywhere.
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴与您分享，2014年是我们最好的一年，我们期待着一个神话般的2015年，在这一年我们将给您带来更多的健康，美好的生活和微笑，以及世界各地的数百万人。

trans-unit.source: We started the year with the deepest research and development effort we’ve ever taken on ourselves – to create the first end-to-end Virtual Care experience that will help people everywhere manage their health and well being. We aspired to support health journeys, yours and your loved ones’, from a wellness aspiration, or physical/emotional discomfort or pain, all the way to reaching a desirable health goal and to feeling good!
trans-unit.target: 我们在这一年开始对自己采取最深入的研究和开发工作 – 创建第一个端到端的在线医护体验，将帮助各地的人们管理他们的健康与保健。我们渴望支持您和您的亲人健康旅程，从健康的愿望，或身体/情绪的不适或疼痛，一直到达到理想的健康目标并感觉良好！

trans-unit.source: Working with data from hundreds of millions of people, and tens of thousands of doctors, and with numerous product iterations, we architected our proprietary path to feeling good in 3 easy steps: “Learn More”, “Get Help”, and “Take Action.” We realized that we are not in the business of just providing health information, or mere “telemedicine” or simply scheduling doctor appointments, we officially and wholeheartedly entered the business of helping people feel good!
trans-unit.target: 通过使用来自数亿人，数万名医生的数据，以及大量的产品迭代，我们构建了我们的感觉良好的专有路径的3个简单的步骤：“了解更多”，“获得帮助”和“采取行动”。我们意识到我们不是仅仅提供健康信息，或仅仅是”远程医疗“或只是安排医生预约，我们正式地和全心的投入帮助人们感觉良好的业务！

trans-unit.source: Simultaneously, we hired the best technical/product/design team in digital health, and one of the best in Silicon Valley, bringing together the brightest engineers with deep expertise in all frameworks and platforms (iOS, Android, Web, and wearables), and with a deep passion for innovation and helping others. We fortified the team with some of the Valley’s finest designers, data geeks, and product managers, and a fabulous customer care and Medical Expert ops team, and together, we repeatedly iterated with millions of users and tens of thousands of doctors, until we were ready to launch our new groundbreaking platform to the world.
trans-unit.target: 同时，我们聘请了数字健康中最好的技术/产品/设计团队，同时也是硅谷最好的团队之一，汇聚了所有框架和平台（iOS，Android，Web和可穿戴设备）里最专业的工程师，他们对创新和帮助他人有着深厚的热情。我们加强了与硅谷最好的设计师，数据极客和产品经理，以及一个神话般的客户关心和医学专家操作团队，与我们一起，反复与数以百万的用户和成千上万的医生，直到我们准备向世界推出我们的新的开创性平台。

trans-unit.source: Our doctor network and user base experienced robust growth and strong engagement throughout the year, even without a marketing budget or team. We could have become profitable at the beginning of the year by turning on display/text ads on our online/mobile pages, but we decided not to do so. Leaving “on the table” millions of dollars every month, we remained true to our mission to focus on making users healthier and happier and giving people the best experience while building the first trusted global consumer brand in digital health.
trans-unit.target: 我们的医生网络和用户群经历了全年的快速增长和强大的参与，即使没有营销预算或团队。 我们可以通过在我们的在线/移动页面上打开展示广告/文字广告并在年初获利，但我们决定不这样做。放弃“触手可得” 的每月数百万美元，我们坚持我们的使命注重使用户更健康，更快乐，给人们最好的体验，同时在数字健康领域中建立第一个可信的全球消费者品牌。

trans-unit.source: Committed to our mission, and to quality, in early fall we launched our first end-to-end service helping people everywhere manage their health and feel good every day. Our new basic service remains available for free, but we also introduced our first paid premium service, HealthTap Prime. This first-of-a-kind service, that was created based on the research we conducted, is premised on the three main modules of our new platform:
trans-unit.target: 致力于我们的使命和质量，在初秋我们推出了我们的第一个端到端帮助世界各地的人们管理他们的健康和每一天都感觉良好的服务。我们新的基本服务仍然是免费的，但我们还介绍了我们的第一个付费的高级服务，HealthTap Prime。基于我们进行的研究创建的这种首创的服务是基于我们的新平台的三个主要模块：

trans-unit.source: Our all new HealthTap Prime, where users get unlimited doctor consults on any mobile device or personal computer 24/7 has been one of our most successful services to date, and is growing very rapidly! HealthTap Prime and our new platform received an unprecedented warm welcome in traditional and social media – attracting more than 82 original stories in print, digital, and broadcast, media (from WIRED Magazine, to Good Morning America, and from Forbes Magazine to ABC News, everyone everywhere praised our innovation and the value we’re creating for people everywhere).
trans-unit.target: 我们所有新的HealthTap Prime，用户可以在任何移动设备或个人计算机上24/7全天候获得无限医生咨询是我们迄今为止最成功的服务之一，并且增长非常迅速！HealthTap Prime和我们的新平台在传统和社交媒体上获得了前所未有的热烈欢迎——吸引了在印刷，数字和广播，媒体超过82个原创故事（从连线杂志，到早安美国，从“福布斯”杂志到ABC新闻，每个人都称赞我们的创新和我们为世界各地的人创造的价值）。

trans-unit.source: To capitalize on the success of HealthTap Prime, and extend our reach to doctors everywhere, HealthTap recently launched our first nationwide Digital Health Marketplace for accessing care, providing 24/7 fast affordable access to everyone’s own doctors, as well as to doctors in 105 specialties. Our all-new HealthTap Concierge service, available in all 50 states, connects people instantaneously to their own physicians and a network of more than 1 million top doctors–anytime, anywhere. Now every doctor in the US, and eventually all over the world, who gets a license from HealthTap, can provide an end-to-end virtual care experience to their own patients anytime, anywhere from any mobile device or personal computer!
trans-unit.target: 为了充分利用HealthTap Prime的成功，并扩大我们世界各地医生的覆盖范围，HealthTap最近推出了我们第一个与健康有关的全国数字化健康市场，提供24/7全天候的快速实惠的访问每个人自己医生，以及来自105个专科的医生的服务。我们全新的HealthTap贵宾台服务，可在全部50个州，将人们立即连接到他们自己的医生和一个拥有超过100万位顶级医生的网络-- 随时随地。现在每个在美国，最终遍布世界各地的医生，从HealthTap获得执业执照，可以随时随地从任何移动设备或个人计算机向自己的患者提供端到端在线医护体验！

trans-unit.source: Finally, to welcome the promising future of wearables, we launched the first ever healthcare app on Android Wear bringing checklists, reminders and tips from HealthTap doctors to smart-watches. We’ve since continued our rigorous R&D in wearables, iterated several times, and we’re now super excited to work on another stealthy upcoming watch project, and bring real healthcare and medicine to people through wearables everywhere. We strongly believe that wearables and smart-watches will be a very important premise for everyone’s health in the future, and are committed to leading the way in healthcare in this space.
trans-unit.target: 最后，为了欢迎可穿戴设备的未来，我们推出了第一个带有安卓系统的健康医护应用程序，将HealthTap医生的清单，提醒和小贴士发送到智能手表。我们已经继续了我们严谨的可穿戴设备的研发，多次更新换代，并且我们现在非常兴奋开发另一个即将到来的隐身手表项目，通过可穿戴设备随时随地带给人们真正的健康医护服务。 我们坚信可穿戴设备和智能手表将是未来关于每个人健康的非常重要的前提，而且我们致力于在这个健康医护领域取得领先地位。

trans-unit.source: After a fabulous year of deep research, development, a landmark launch, and rapid organic growth, we feel very confident for a super promising 2015. In the New Year we’re planning to take the groundbreaking platform that we’ve built, which has already proven great product-market fit and natural consumer and doctor traction, and distribute the valuable services built on it to everyone everywhere. We’re excited for a year of strong growth and even more robust engagement, where we can give access to our products and services to hundreds of millions of people everywhere. We’re thrilled about reaching these people through mobile and wearable devices, as well as via the good ol’ Web, and we’re also thrilled to partner with small, medium and large medical and healthcare practices to help doctors and highly reputable institutions provide virtual care to their own patients anytime anywhere.
trans-unit.target: 经过一年的深入研究，开发，一个里程碑式的发布，以及快速的有机增长，我们对于2015年超级乐观的前景充满信心。在新的一年中，我们计划充分利用我们已经建立的开创性的并且已经展现了良好的产品市场契合度以及自然的消费者和医生配合度的平台，并将平台上有价值的服务推广到所有地区的每一个人。我们对于一个强劲的增长和更强大的参与度感到兴奋，因为我们可以为世界各地数亿人提供我们的产品和服务。 我们很高兴通过移动设备和可穿戴设备以及优质网络接触这些人，我们也非常高兴能与中小型和大型医疗和健康医护诊疗合作，帮助医生和声誉良好的机构随时随地向自己的患者提供在线医护。

trans-unit.source: For 2015, we’re getting very excited about the rapid adoption of wearable computing. We believe that there’s a huge opportunity to bring together the valuable health data that’s collected with these wearables, and help doctors make better recommendations for their patients for better courses of action via virtual consults powered by this data. Moreover, we believe that these wearables can also function as great communication devices to help our doctors not only learn about their patients, but also send patients the right signals at the right moments to close valuable feedback loops and encourage the right behaviors at the right times. We’ve already integrated Apple’s HealthKit, and Google Fit into the HealthTap experience, and we see a huge opportunity in collaborating with large and small players in the industry to make the promise of wearables and big data a valuable reality for doctors and users in 2015.
trans-unit.target: 在2015年，我们对可穿戴设备的广泛使用感到非常兴奋。我们相信，我们拥有一个巨大的机会去收集与这些可穿戴设备宝贵的健康数据，并帮助医生为患者提供更好的建议，通过这些数据在线咨询更好的行动。 此外，我们相信这些可穿戴设备也可以作为伟大的通信设备，帮助我们的医生不仅了解他们的患者，而且在适当的时候给患者正确的信号以关闭宝贵的反馈回路，并在合适的时间鼓励正确的行为 。 我们已经将苹果的HealthKit和Google Fit整合到HealthTap的体验中，我们看到了与行业中的大型和小型企业合作的巨大机会，使可穿戴设备和大数据的承诺成为2015年医生和用户的有价值的现实。

trans-unit.source: There are so many exciting opportunities for us 2015, but most importantly, we’re here to serve you and your loved ones, and make everyone everywhere healthier and happier! Thanks for helping us make HealthTap an ever-better service, and for putting your trust in us – we’re always here to do more, to do better, to make sure we deserve your support and trust, and of course, to smile :) Please continue to send us your feedback and the best people you know - we’re continuing to expand and grow, and need the best ideas, and best people to make this world a healthier happier place in 2015!
trans-unit.target: 对于我们而言，在2015年有这么多令人兴奋的机会，但最重要的是，我们在这里为您和您所爱的人服务，让无处不在的每个人更健康，更快乐！感谢您帮助我们使HealthTap成为一个更好的服务，并且信任我们 - 我们会一直做得更多，做得更好，以确保我们值得您的支持和信任，当然，要继续保持微笑:) 请继续向我们发送您的反馈和推荐您认识的优秀的人 - 我们将不断的成长，并且我们需要最好的想法和最优秀的人，使这个世界在2015年成为更健康，更幸福的地方！

trans-unit.source: Happy New Year to you and your loved ones and looking forward to a great 2015!
trans-unit.target: 祝您和您爱的人的新年快乐，期待伟大的2015年！

FeelGood with HealthTap Prime - Subscribe Today for Peace of Mind

trans-unit.source: As the fabulous 2014 is winding down and giving way to a promising 2015, I'd like to send you and your loved ones warm wishes and big smiles for the holidays, and all the best for a super happy New Year!
trans-unit.target: 作为神话般的2014年正在结束并让路给更有前途的2015年，我希望送给您与您的亲人温暖的祝福和大大的微笑，以及一切都是最好的一个超级快乐的新年！

trans-unit.source: You may have heard that the very first case of Ebola in the U.S. was diagnosed in Texas last week. HealthTap doctors are ready and willing to help with any questions you have, including information about early symptoms and how the virus spreads. With HealthTap Prime you don’t need to schedule and wait for an appointment, or even leave your home; connect immediately with a doctor on HealthTap Prime, and get the peace of mind that you and your family are safe.
trans-unit.target: 您可能已经听说，美国的第一例埃博拉病毒，上周在德克萨斯被确诊。HealthTap医生已经准备好并愿意帮助您的任何问题，包括关于早期症状和病毒如何传播的信息。使用HealthTap Prime您不需要安排和等待预约，甚至离开您的家; 您可以立即与HealthTap Prime的医生取得联系，让您和您的家人安全无忧。

trans-unit.source: The all new HealthTap Prime is the revolutionary service that gives you unlimited Virtual Consults with top primary-care doctors 24/7 from anywhere, via HD video or text chats. Ask any question, get a prescription refill, and even receive a second opinion about your health and well-being, right from any computer or mobile device.
trans-unit.target: 所有全新的HealthTap Prime是革命性的服务，通过高清视频或文本聊天随时随地为您提供无限的，与顶级普通门诊医生的全天24小时在线咨询。您可以询问任何问题，获得再配方处方，甚至从任何计算机或移动设备收到关于您健康和幸福的第二意见。

trans-unit.source: Like with all Inbox Consults, the patient is expecting a response within 24 hours. If neither you nor your colleague(s) reply within this time period, your Concierge account(s) may be put on hold until we can confirm that you're receiving our notifications and able to reply to patient requests.
trans-unit.target: 和所有收件箱咨询一样，患者希望在24小时之内收到回复。如果您或者您的同事未在指定时间内回答患者的问题，您的贵宾台账户会被锁定直到我们能确认您可以收到我们的提醒并有能力回答患者的问题。

trans-unit.source: This consult is first come, first serve.
That means if one of your physician colleagues responds first, it will no longer be available for your response.

You may ask the patient a follow-up question if needed before completing your note. You may send your patient questions as many times as you like.

trans-unit.source: How much will you earn? Play around with the calculator at the bottom of the page. trans-unit.source: You can access your claims submission history anytime on the Grow Your Practice page of your HealthTap Virtual Practice. If a claim requires your attention the status will be labeled “Needs Update” and once you open the claim, the fields requiring your attention will be identified. After editing the necessary items, you will be able to resubmit the claim to the insurance company for reimbursement.
trans-unit.target: 您可以随时通过您的HealthTap在线诊疗“成长您的诊疗页面”访问您的历史索赔。如果一项索赔需要您留意，这一项会被标注“需要更新”，一旦您打开它，您所需要注意的事项就会被识别。在编辑完成必要项目之后，您可以重新向保险公司索赔以获得赔偿。

trans-unit.source: It appears that you have insurance claims that need to be reviewed and submitted. Please note that claims are automatically submitted 7 days after a consult is completed. Please review and make any submit the claim within this time period.

trans-unit.source: While we regret that we cannot submit the claim again on your behalf via our platform, this does not mean that the insurance company’s decision is final. You are free to resubmit the claim independently to the patient’s insurance provider through any alternative channel you currently use. In many instances, these resubmitted claims are approved upon re-submission, and you can still receive payment for the services you provided.
trans-unit.target: 我们很遗憾不能通过我们的平台代表您再次提交索赔，但这并不意味着保险公司的决定是最终的。您可以自由地通过您当前使用的其他渠道患者的保险提供商来独立地再次提出索赔。在许多情况下，这些再次提交的索赔会被许可，您依然可以收到您所提供的服务的报酬。

trans-unit.source: You can access your claims submission history anytime on the Grow Your Practice page of your HealthTap Virtual Practice. All your approved claims will have the status labeled “Accepted.”

trans-unit.target: 吸引和留住更多的患者。将未付费呼叫，电子邮件和停机时间转换为收入。

trans-unit.source: Reduced costs and enhanced bottom line
Fewer unnecessary follow-ups; in-person care reserved for higher value or necessary visits.
trans-unit.target: 减少不必要的跟进; 个人医护保留更高的价值或必要的访问。

trans-unit.source: Substantially improve the quality of care
Offer best-practice after-hours service and advanced chronic care management.
trans-unit.target: 提供最好的下班后的服务和高级的长期医护管理

trans-unit.source: Increase adherence while improving health outcomes with automated reminders from you to your patients with no additional effort.
trans-unit.target: 提高依从性，同时从您和患者的自动提醒改善健康结果而不需要额外的努力。

trans-unit.source: More timely, efficient and cost-effective care
trans-unit.target: 更加及时，高效和具有成本效益的医护

trans-unit.source: Quickly triage all patients to proper care and provide the right care, at the right time and at the right price. Offer after hours care and information 24/7, without additional expenses.
trans-unit.target: 迅速将所有患者分流至适当的医护，并在合适的时间和地点，以合适的价格提供合适的医护。提供下班后24/7全天候的医护和信息，无需额外花费。

trans-unit.source: Easily maintain ongoing relationships with your patients that deepen trust and long-term commitment to you as a provider, and encourage referrals to family members and friends.
trans-unit.target: 很容易与您的患者保持不间断的关系，作为一个提供者对您加深的信任和长期的承诺，并鼓励转诊给家人和朋友。

trans-unit.source: Showcase doctors’ reputation and expertise online with Virtual Practice (ViP) profiles published to hundreds of millions worldwide.
trans-unit.target: 通过在全世界数以亿计的在线诊疗(ViP) 个人资料中在线展示医生的声誉和专业知识。

trans-unit.source: Save precious time by preventing repetitive answers by publishing them to our knowledgebase. Eliminate manual follow ups with your patients by you or your staff by automating reminders.
trans-unit.target: 通过发布到我们的知识库，避免重复的回答以节省宝贵的时间。通过自动提醒，消除您或您的员工对您的患者的手动跟踪。

trans-unit.source: Learn from your colleagues & earn CME
trans-unit.target: 向您的同事学习并赚取CME

trans-unit.source: Earn unlimited free AMA PRA Category 1<sup>TM</sup> CME credits while sharing knowledge with colleagues and patients.
trans-unit.target: 当与同事和患者分享知识时获得无限免费的AMA PRA 1类交易<sup>TM</sup>CME信用。

trans-unit.source: Easy, immediate access to your practice’s high-quality doctors and their knowledge from any personal computer or mobile device.
trans-unit.target: 从任何个人计算机或移动设备轻松，立即的访问您的诊疗的高质量医生和他们的知识。

trans-unit.source: No waiting rooms. Patients can find doctor knowledge in an extensive trusted library, schedule virtual appointments with specialists, request first and second opinions from doctors, and securely and privately share their personal health records with doctors anytime from anywhere.
trans-unit.target: 没有候诊室。患者可以在广泛可信的图书馆找到医生知识，安排与专科医生的在线预约，请求医生的第一和第二意见，并随时随地的安全和私人的与医生共享他们的个人健康记录。

trans-unit.source: HealthTap guides patients to the right care, at the right time, at the right cost.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap指导患者在合适的时间和合理的花费下获得合适的医护。
随时随地，24/7全天候为您服务

trans-unit.source: Access individualized answers, news, and tips created by doctors based on the patient’s proprietary Health Graph and aggregate data.
trans-unit.target: 访问医生根据患者的专有健康图表和汇总数据创建的个性化回答，新闻和小贴士。

trans-unit.source: World-class, empathetic doctors readily available from any mobile device or PC create long-lasting relationships between the practice, its doctors, and its patients.
trans-unit.target: 从任何移动设备或个人电脑可以获得世界级的专注的医生在诊疗，其医生和其患者之间创建的持久的关系。
大幅添加您的实习收入

trans-unit.source: Reduce unnecessary doctor and ER visits through our data-driven triaging system.
trans-unit.target: 通过我们的数据驱动的分类系统减少不必要的医生和电子病历的访问。

trans-unit.source: Lower absenteeism and presenteeism due to immediate, easy access to doctors.
trans-unit.target: 由于可以立即容易的访问医生产生比较低的缺勤和出勤。

trans-unit.source: Offer a unique, cutting-edge healthcare solution that other companies can’t.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个独特的，先进的健康医护解决方案，而其他公司不能。

trans-unit.source: Manage a happier, healthier workforce or member base.
trans-unit.target: 管理一个更快乐，更健康的员工或成员基地。

trans-unit.source: Improve health and curb healthcare costs
trans-unit.target: 改善健康并抑制健康医护费用

trans-unit.source: Prevent more expensive treatments and procedures with ongoing doctor support and engagement enabling health lifestyle changes.
trans-unit.target: 预防更昂贵的治疗和临床操作与持续的医生支持和参与，使健康的生活方式得到变化。

trans-unit.source: Enjoy peace of mind knowing that HealthTap is HIPAA-compliant and SOC 2 Type II-certified, which means your data is always safe and secure.
trans-unit.target: 知道HealthTap符合HIPAA标准和SOC 2 II类认证后，可以完全的放心，这意味着您的数据始终是安全和安全的。

trans-unit.source: A doctor’s DocScore is a measure of their knowledge, trust, compassion and engagement.
trans-unit.target: 医生的医术分用于衡量他们的知识、可信度、同情心和参与度。

trans-unit.target: 您是否曾被诊断为注意力不集中症？

trans-unit.target: 您是否因为抑郁或焦虑而住院？

trans-unit.target: 您有出过水痘或接种过水痘疫苗吗？

trans-unit.source: Have you had an STD in the past?

trans-unit.source: Have you had any of the following?
Have you had regular colon cancer screening?
trans-unit.target: 您有定期进行结肠癌筛查吗？

trans-unit.source: Have you had sex without using a condom in the last month?

trans-unit.source: Have you had your flu shot this year?
trans-unit.target: 您今年有接种流感疫苗吗？

trans-unit.source: Have you have had any abdominal surgeries?
trans-unit.target: 您做过任何腹部手术吗？

trans-unit.source: Have you just had a seizure or feel like you are about to have one again?
trans-unit.target: 您刚刚有癫痫发作或有再次发作的感觉？

trans-unit.source: Have you lost hearing in the ear?
Have you lost vision in your eye?
Have you measured a fever more than 100 degrees Farhenheit by mouth or ear?
trans-unit.target: 您有通过嘴或耳测量了发烧超过100华氏度？

trans-unit.source: Have you recently been exposed to poison oak or poison ivy?
trans-unit.target: 您最近接触过毒栎或毒藤吗？

trans-unit.source: Have you tried a non-prescription dandruff shampoo?
trans-unit.target: 您试过非处方的头皮屑洗发水吗？

trans-unit.source: Have you tried any bendadryl, steroid (hydrocortisone) cream, or calamine lotion?
trans-unit.target: 您有尝试过任何苯那君，类固醇激素（氢化可的松）霜，或炉甘石洗剂吗？

trans-unit.source: Have you tried any of the following antacids?
trans-unit.target: 您尝试过以下任何抗酸药吗？

trans-unit.source: Have you tried any of the following?
trans-unit.target: 您尝试过以下任何一种吗？

trans-unit.source: Have you tried over the counter lice treatment?
How often do you wash your hair?
Is there any blood in your vomit?
Is there clicking or locking in the jaw?
trans-unit.target: 下巴这里有屈伸或交锁问题吗？

trans-unit.source: Is there ringing in your ears?
Was there a breakdown in the skin due to a bite, cut or scrape?
trans-unit.target: 皮肤是否由于咬伤，割伤或刮伤有破损？

trans-unit.target: 打喷嚏，抠鼻子或擤鼻涕痛苦吗？

trans-unit.target: 最近有受伤的脚趾甲吗？

trans-unit.source: Was there trauma to the ankle?

trans-unit.target: 手臂或肩膀是否有损伤（跌倒或举重物？）

trans-unit.target: 有颈部外伤（颈部扭伤或回头太快）？

trans-unit.source: Was there trauma to the wrist?
Were you not able to bear weight on the ankle immediately after the injury?

trans-unit.source: Were you not able to bear weight on the knee immediately after the injury?

However, to better serve you and support the community of patients everywhere, we limit the number of consults to three per day. Please try again tomorrow.

trans-unit.source: This is a followup to tell you how you can profit from an affordable healthcare service that gives your clients peace of mind during their travels. With our award-winning service, your clients will have access to 24/7 immediate medical consultations via mobile or computer from board-certified U.S. doctors any time they have a health concern, from anywhere, for less than $2/day. Earn more income today!
